Last week I had Thai food for lunch, and it didn't sit well with my stomach. I had some explosive issues later in the day at work, and the bathroom was near all of my coworkers' cubicles. Needless to say, the stench ended the workday a little early.	I'm sorry to hear that, but it sounds like it was a bit of an unfortunate coincidence.  I hope you were okay in the end.

Yes, it was quite the uncomfortable experience. Now all of my coworkers have given me the nickname 'Diarrhea Joe'	I can understand how that would be a problem. Did you end up getting a stomach bug or was it just something else?
I was on a road trip last week and had to stop a gas station to use the restroom. It looked like they had never cleaned the bathroom, ever!	That is so gross!
I know! The worst part is that I have irritable bowel syndrome, and I made the bathroom about twice as bad as it was initially!	I know that feeling! I was so disgusted.

I stole a TV from a local appliance store. It is a 80 inch behemoth, but I am feeling a little guilty. On the plus side, the 4k picture is astounding!	That's a good point. I'm sure the owner will be happy to see it.
Yes, I am torn between my desire to keep the TV and my guilt. What should I do?	I would probably just return it. I would also try to figure out why you wanted it so badly.

it infuriates me that my wife expects me to read her mind where she wants to eat.	That is the worst.  I have a wife who is a complete mind reader.  She will be "oh, I want to go to Starbucks, but I don't want to go to Starbucks."

Me either. If you would like to go to a specific place to eat just tell me. I'd rather do that than hear why you dont like the place we ended up.	I can understand why you would.  I don't like the place we went either.  It is hard to get a good meal at the place we ended up.  We ended up going to a different restaurant.  I think we will go to the place we wanted to eat next.  I don't like to go anywhere else.
I recently had a long weekend with some old friends. It was fantastic.	Oh wow! How was it?
it was. We've spent a lot of time together and apart now, so it was good to catchup.	That sounds great! I've been busy too!
I just finished two college classes that I have been taking this summer! I am glad to be done.	That is awesome! What are the classes for?

Yes, exactly! My professor seemed to be a compulsive liar. For instance, two days ago he claimed that a local church used their 'personal fire department' (due to the large size of the church) to hose down protesters that were aggravated about the church's tax exemptions. Ludicrous!	That's so awesome. I love that you got through those two courses and can now take a breath.
Not long ago I realized we are more financially stable than I think we have ever been.	Yeah I feel like we have gotten more financially free over the years.
Keep moving forwards with our plans and feel great!	That's great to hear. I've always been a bit frugal.
My friends help me and they scold me when necessary ... God will give you happiness	Yeah! I feel like they really care about me, I'm glad they are my friends
I wish they did not suffer, because it is my suffering	That's very kind of them to do that, I'm sure they're happy they could help you.
Thanks for your comprehension	Not long ago we had a horrible storm come through. You could barely see 5 feet outside the window.	I'm so glad you're safe!  What was the worst part?

By the time we noticed how bad it was, we had to stay put. Our phones staying blaring telling us to seek shelter. We piled in the bathroom til it passed.	I would have liked that! I hate storms. They are always so scary.

I have a disease called Lupus.  Because I am so sick from this It causes me to lose alot of friends.  I am not able to go out and hand out like I use to because I am just to sick to get out.  It makes me lonely.	Oh, I'm sorry.  I hope that you can still enjoy the time you have with friends.  Do you have any family that you can stay with?

No unfortunately there isn't.  You can sometimes go into remission with really powerful drugs but that isn't guaranteed	I'm sorry you have to deal with that.  I hope you can get through it.  It's not easy but it will get better
no it is an autoimmune disease	Hi, I'm separated, I'm hurt and my heart is broken	That is terrible. Are you looking for someone to talk to?
one month I am desolate ... I hope to see the light at the end of the tunnel	It sounds like you have a tough road ahead.  I hope you can get through it and come out the other side.

is that he loved her	This is terrible but there was this bad smell getting worse and worse in my kitchen. Couldn't find where it was coming from.	That sounds awful. I hope they were able to get it figured out.
Went under the sink for something and when I moved it there was a puddle there. The sink had been leaking and the water was funky.	It's always something with the plumbing!
I recently went on a trip with a woman I adore. The trip ended poorly, though, and things have not been the same since.	Oh no! I'm sorry. What did happen?

We did not capitalize well on the short amount of time that we had together.	I am sorry. I know that things are better now but sometimes we have to wait a little longer. I hope you are happy and not lonely.

If my upstairs neighbor wakes me at 3am again I think I'll explode! I get that she has to go to work, but why not get organized the night before for goodness sake?!	I know what you mean!  I have to get my kids ready for school in the middle of the night!
You too, huh? How do you nicely ask someone to shut up? Yelling at that time of day just wouldn't be right.	I agree with you. I would never want my neighbor to wake me at night.

Nice idea, but I don't think subtlety is their strong point - they'd be liable to make even more noise, lol.	I'm not sure I would have thought of yelling.  I'd just be a bit of a jerk and tell them to go to hell.  I don't think I'd be a jerk like that in the first place.  I just don't like the noise of yelling and yelling and yelling.  I think that's just a natural part of life, but I think I'd just try to find a more constructive way to deal with the situation.  I think that's a lot
I guess I could. Or I could just move. Still mad though!	It is always good to have some backup plan, and to know that you have the means to move on.

I'm seeing my orthopedic surgeon soon and he'll tell me if he can operate on my hip. I so hope he says yes, but the suspense is killing me!	Oh, I'm sorry to hear that.  Hopefully he will be able to do it.  What kind of surgery?

I fell and fractured it two years ago. My then surgeon botched the operation and I have to use a walker to get around. If this new guy can do something I could walk properly again!	That's terrible! I hope he can do something to help!
From what I've read, unless it's a class-action lawsuit my chances are practically nil. The surgeon'll just lawyer up. What happened to you?	I am so sorry to hear about that.

Oh dear lord. How unbearably dreadful! I hope that your lawyer takes that creep to the cleaners. Won't bring your baby back but will hopefully ensure he doesn't do it to someone else.	You are right. I've heard some doctors do that. It's not good, I agree.

The weather here feels kinda mild today, I'm shocked that it's only in the 80s in August.	That's crazy!  I live in a place that's way too hot in August, so I don't know what to expect.  Do you live in the Midwest or East Coast?  I live in the Midwest, and it's way too hot there in August!  I don't think it's even possible to be 80s in the Midwest!
I am. It's not blazing hot so I plan on mowing the grass and getting some yardwork done.	That is good news. I am happy for it.
Writing speeches makes me nervous	It does?  why?

Yeah, it seems like the learning curve is impossible! Maybe I just need more life experience	I agree, it's a learning curve, but it's worth it! It's a great way to practice your speech skills and get ready to be on stage!

True, a lot of people don't even have to think about what they're gonna say	I don't watch a lot of kids movies these days, but they always bring back fond memories	That's true. I used to watch a lot when I was younger.
I've seen the movie Trolls probably 100 times, that and Harry Potter!	That's a good movie. I haven't seen it in ages.

Yeah, sometimes there's more to those movies than you think, like they actually considered how adults would react	That's true.  I have seen that movie many times and still think that Harry Potter is the best movie.  Harry Potter is more realistic than the other movies, I mean you have to deal with the fact that Harry didn't have a father and was left to be raised on his own.

Yeah, maybe kids are just getting smarter with the internet and everything	It's true, kids are smart, but they're also stupid. I've had some good friends over and I've had some bad friends over. I don't know what's going on.
Getting my first job felt like I had a lot more freedom with my life	I am glad you have your first job.
Dairy Queen, it was the only restaurant in my town	That's cool. I have never been to Dairy World.
True, most of my friends worked there too so it wasn't too boring.	Yeah, but they are really bad for you.
Yeah, so there wasn't too much of a pressure to work really hard, it wasn't too busy either	That is good. You worked at that place?
Seeing people do good things for each other always brightens my day	You must be a good person yourself.
Yeah, someone paid for this guy's groceries in the store without asking!	I love seeing that.
Yeah I think we should have more of that kind of thing	Rolling down a huge downhill street with no brakes was fun but nervewracking	Yeah, I love downhill streets.
I found a bike on the side of the road but didn't test it before coasting down this hill	That was so fun! Did you ride it to the bottom?

Yeah, usually I don't trust myself with those kinds of things, but I decided to go for it, rolled on some grass to lose a little speed	When you're in the sauna and the man next to you decides to take off his towel... No thanks	That's not cool.
Yeah, I'm not good with confrontations	That's disgusting. I don't understand why people would do that.

I don't think I've ever regretted not saying anything, but sometimes I can say the wrong thing or it just comes out wrong	I found out yesterday at work that I'm one of the top performers for my district!  I figured I was doing good, I didn't know I was doing *that* well!	That is awesome! Congratulations!

Usually at the end of the day it's never anything nice when my supervisor wants to talk to me but she broke the news and I was surprised!  Been walking on sunshine all weekend!	That's awesome! Congrats! I hope you get some good recognition.
How long have you been there?	I have been there before. I was so surprised that she broke the news.  I was surprised that I got the news first!

I'm sure you've done some good work - would it be hard to talk to someone and make your case?	I am new here and I have been here for about 2 weeks. I'm not sure if I can get my application approved. I'm hoping I can get a job soon so I can start to get my life back on track.
My bank refunded me 100 bucks over a clerical error!	That is really nice of them.  I bet you were so relieved.

Not sure yet.  I know some of it has to go for groceries, but the rest - I should save it, my burned out laptop needs a new hard drive.	I know that feeling when something goes wrong. It can be stressful.

If I had dispensible funds like that, there'd definitely be an anime pillow with a handsome guy on it, but alas, priorites.  *lol*	I found out I was a top ranked performer in my district yesterday!	That's great! What did you do to earn such a great recognition?

I got a gift card to a restaurant locally for my family.  That's a good enough bonus for me - the four of us tend to put a dent in the menu when we go out!  *chuckle*	That's awesome! Congrats! What restaurant was it?
I'm just happy to be recognized, especially since most times I just see myself as a 'cog in the wheel'.	That's nice! I hope you guys enjoy it!
I just do the best I can - that's all anyone really expects.	So I forgot to get my son a bag of chips from the store today.	Oh no! I'm sorry you forgot. I've done that too.

He kinda gave me the "Mom, really?" look but I told him that we'd ride to the store in the morning b/c I looked around the kitchen and realized there was other stuff I forgot.  *chuckle*	Oh man! I would have been really mad at you for not getting the chips for him!  I have 2 kids myself so I know how hard it can be to get things done when you forget the most important ones.  Maybe next time you can ask him what he really wants and he can help you out!

I do, too.  I tend to get 'mom brain' at the worst times!  I'll be happy when he is old enough to get his own chips [he's 10 now].	Yeah, I can imagine that.  It's hard when you forget things, especially when you're a mom.  I remember the times when my kids forgot stuff.  It's like they forget everything except for the one thing you forgot!

It's easier with a list but still, you always remember the one thing off of the list and then it turns into TEN things off of the list.  XD	That is the worst.  I'm glad you are okay though.  Do you have any kids?
I forgot to pick up a bag of chips for my son from the grocery store.	It happens to me sometimes.

No, I didn't.  We live in a rural area and the grocery store is 20 minutes away.  Lucky for him, I forgot some other stuff for tomorrow's dinner [mom brain!] and I told him that we could ride together tomorrow back to the store.	That is so lucky. I would forget something like that too.
Multiple bags of chips, to be sure!  *chuckle*	That sounds like fun!  What did you make for dinner?

Those are a lifesaver - he's in Scouts and he's starting soccer soon.  Those 24 packs are the best!	My landlady was really understanding when I told her that I would be late with rent this month.	That is very kind of her.  I have a very hard time paying rent on time, but she is the only place I have ever lived.  I am going through some really tough times right now, and I am not able to afford to pay rent.  I was able to talk her down on the amount and she was very understanding about it.

I was nervous about talking to her because I hate having to disappoint her - she's related to me.  So I didn't think she'd be as cool about it as she was.	That is very kind of her, it is very hard to have a landlord who is understanding and empathetic. I hope you get a great deal on your rent this month.
Yeah, I think that's where the anxiety was - the not knowing.	I had a big presentation yesterday but I think I nailed it!	I'm sure you did. You must be very good at your job. What kind of job it is?
I had to explain global warming to my son's Boy Scout troop.	Oh, I love that.  What did they think of it?

Nope, just a mom.  I had to do some research on the internet and it was a real eye-opener for me.  I believe in global warming but a lot of the facts on both sides of the argument surprised even me.	I broke up with my boyfriend last week.	Oh, how did you break up?

Well, I'm hanging in there.  This is the first weekend we've not been together and outside of being online, the quiet is kinda loud.	I know how you feel, it's tough. But I think you should be happy that you're taking a chance on life.

Yeah.  It's a positive that we broke up, I'm just looking for healthy ways to deal with the energy that's left.	I found out that I'm getting a bonus for having the top rating in my district!	That is great news!  Congratulations!
I help manage distribution for a large company in my city.  Really I just hold a clipboard and crunch lots of numbers.  LOL	That's amazing, you should be proud of yourself!

This is my first bonus in 10 years.  After feeling like a cog in the wheel, it's nice that someone noticed my hard work!	I was so blissful after the births of both my girls. Such a sense of peace and relief on both a mental and physical level!	That is great!  What were their names?

15 and 19! It hasn't always been blissful, as any relationship's journey can attest to! But still a blessing. And maybe one day you'll be a dad...?	I hope so. I'm a little worried that it'll be too late though.

Ah, make the most of your nieces + nephews! You get to be the fun/cool/understanding uncle -- someone maybe a little more objective to turn to (depending on age!)	Seems like every time we get a bill and I think I know how much it is, it	Yeah, bills can be such a headache.

Yes, that's exactly what I was trying to say haha hit enter too early. I thought we had lowered the electric use but boy was I wrong!	It happens to me too, I hate it when that happens! I'm glad you got to cancel it though, hope you didn't pay it!
The start of school for my 2 teenagers is less than a week away!	Oh wow! Are they excited?
It is! We actually got everything they need and more, except for a few notebooks.	That must be exciting!
The other day I was just having a really off day. Just couldn't get my mind and body to work right.	It's okay. What happened on that day?

It does but I'm sure the people at the busy store thought I was drunk. I ran into everything, shelves, displays and even the door when I was leaving.	That's a bummer.  Maybe you can try to get your mind in the game for tomorrow.
really didnt want to anything for days	Oh no! Did something happen?
I studied really hard all night infact but when my results came, i had nothing to show for it".	Yeah I can understand that. What was the exam for?

it is indeed. wont happen again though	I was attending a conference and heard the minister speak. he spoke with such grace that i was proud to be from that district".	That's really inspiring. What was the minister talk about?
it was. i always questioned how he got the position but it makes sense now	i think he was a very intelligent person.
I feel uneasy because I don't know if I will be able to save enough money in time	I am sure you will do your best.
Baby is due in less than 3 months	That's scary, I hope you can save enough money to pay for the baby!
I worked hard all night for that exam. it takes 5 months to get the results back. the wait is killing me	Oh man, 5 months is a long time.  Are you sure it's worth waiting that long?
5 months to find out !	Yeah I know how you feel, I have to wait 2 weeks for my results too.
I tried so hard for that exam, when i found out i got first! it was overwhelming!	Oh, I bet you felt great!
thanks. now onto bigger things	That is great! I bet you feel like a rockstar now!
starting a clinic	it was the grand opening for our restaurant. The whole town was there. almost double the number of people we were expecting	That is awesome. What did you serve?
thanks. i think its an achivement of the whole town	Oh wow, that's awesome. Did you have a lot of work to do?

I had no confidence and didn't have a girlfriend until age 22. I carried a lot of hatred towards girls because of this	I'm sorry that you have to go through this.  I'm sure you're a very nice person, and that's why you have no girlfriend.
Oh yes. It all changed when I directed what was inside towards the gym	That's great that you were able to work it out and now you're in a relationship.
I'm happy with my daily routine. I don't like change	I like routine too.  It's so relaxing!
Especially when it comes to food. Like breakfast. I eat the same thing daily.	That is great, what does it consist of?
I can get fit in 3 months. Takes discipline	That is awesome! You must have worked hard for it.

I eat plenty of carbs. It's all about timing	Oh yeah, I've been trying to eat more carbs, and I've been doing a lot of cardio. I think I'm starting to see a change.  I've lost about 10 pounds in the last 3 weeks. I'm going for the 3 month goal, and I think I'm going to start doing a little bit of strength training too.
the floods destroyed everything. The insurer is not returning our calls	That's terrible. Did you get any money from your insurance?
Last week. we're in temporary housing now	Oh no.  That must be really stressful.  Did you try contacting the insurance company again?  Maybe they will be able to help with your temporary housing.
I was just a kid but can't forget that day I left him alone in the rain. He should've just taken my hand!	I'm so glad you're okay. That's the worst part about being young.
I don't know what happened to that kid to be honest.	That's awful! Did he survive the rain?
I recieved a call from my mother today.  She said she was in town.	Did you get to talk with her?
Yes she took me out to a restaurant and presented me with a book I had been wanting.	I love when people surprise me.  I'm glad she did.
I can't find another way to earn money	That can be frustrating.  I have been struggling financially lately too.
I just want to work from home	Oh no. Are you worried about getting in trouble?
I can't wait for my baby boy. Less than 3 months to go now	Oh wow. I'm glad you're excited about the baby boy, I hope everything goes well!
You know, not much to be honest. Just a few clothes and things. Need the buggy asap	Yeah, that is a big deal for me too. I'm glad you have a new baby.  I hope you get a lot of sleep soon.
I pray to God that every worry will be taken care of. Especially the baby essentials	That's great, I hope everything goes well!

I sure do. A baby boy. Less than 3 months to go now but it's hard saving up money. Just had a major car repair. It has set me way back	I can imagine how hard that is, I am a little worried about you.  I hope everything works out and that the baby goes well!
She refused me but then a few days later I saw her and she was embarrassed of her lie. I was shorter and younger than the other guy.	Oh that's cute. Did you guys get back together?
Yeah. I put her through hell that school year. Made up all sorts of rumors	That's so rude of them.
I got angry when she refused. But I should've been more understanding	Oh I see, you were upset because she refused to do something for you?
I shouldn't have forced the issue and so I promised never to ask again	I understand how you would be upset, but it sounds like you're a very understanding person, that's good
I got my four year old daughter her first tricycle yesterday.	That is a big milestone!
She was having such a blast she went downhill and toppled over.  She took it like a champ but I was scared.	I am sure she will be a pro at that in no time.
I did so much practice running in preparation for my 50 metre sprint race at my school!	That's cool! What did you do to practice?
I do! I am so motivated to win and I believe I am one of the fastest at my school.	I am sure you will do great, keep practicing!
I feel nostalgic when playing old school games with my bro	It's always fun playing old games with friends. I have a few old games that I still play.

Yes and also Sega Genesis. We play these on the xbox one though via emulation	It's always fun to play old games, and I'm glad you can play them now on the Xbox 1! I used to play old games on the Sega Dreamcast, and Sega 32X, and Sega Saturn. I'm glad you have the ability to play them!
I was so scared of going onto the train!	I know, I was. I was going to take a trip on it but I was afraid I would fall out of the window.
No but I hate going in objects that travel fast, I really did not want to go on it.	I hate train rides as well.
I am going to get us a new car!	It is always good to get new car.
I'm not sure yet. Maybe a Toyota	That sounds like a great idea! Are you looking for something specific?
I introduced my oldest daughter to the movie Fight Club the other day.	It was pretty intense. I was worried she might get upset with me for showing it.
She loved it.  She's 17, I was 18 when it came out and I would watch it all the time with my friends back then.	That's awesome. What was it about the movie that you liked?
I can't seem to feel happy but I'm not depressed	I feel you, I am feeling the same way right now
I just feel kinda stuck in life	That is good to hear!  I'm sure that life will change for you soon.
I had pizza at a restaurant a couple days ago and found a hair on my pizza!	That's disgusting. What kind of hair?

I told the waited and demanded a refund! It was gross.	Oh my goodness!  That is disgusting!  I'm sure you were upset about that.  I've had my fair share of hair in my food.  I just wish that wasn't a part of the meal that I ordered.  I'm so glad you got your money back.  I think I'm going to order a salad at the next meal I have at that restaurant!
I finally got a new bike! I've been wanting one for so long!	I'm happy for you.  What's the bike?
I hope so, my new bike has so many gears. Such an upgrade from my last one! I can't wait to take it out.	I hope you enjoy your new bike!
Pretty soon I'll be taking over my parents mortgage.  Homeownership is on the horizon.	Yeah!  That is so awesome!  Congratulations.  I hope you have fun in your new home!

A huge step. But I'm done with renting and I have a lot of renovating plans in the works.	I'm so jealous!  How long has your parents been renting?  What type of property are you going to purchase?  I'm a first-time home buyer and I am so nervous about this!
I'm the only one who cares about paying bills. It's very frustrating	I'm the opposite! I pay all bills on time!
Unfortunately no. It's very hard on me because I have to be disciplined with spending. Makes life very boring	I feel you, I'm the only one who pays all of our bills.
I have a beautiful gray cat named Stormy.  Unfortunately she's contracted feline AIDS.	I am so sorry to hear that.
Yep, she's pretty far gone now.  I now have to consider putting her down.	That's terrible. Did she die quickly or slowly?
I just got an assigment.  I was doing well on it but rushed through the very end.  Now I'm not sure I'll be paid.	I am sure it will be fine.  You will be paid.
I can no longer prove I did the assignment.  Computer work is for the birds sometimes.	Oh, that's terrible. Did you talk to the professor about it?
I found an old picture in a box of my Great Grandparents.	That's a cool find, I bet it was really interesting to see old family pictures
Not visibly.  It was a picture from their wedding day and it brought a smile to my face to see them so young.	That's nice! What was your Great Grandfather's name?
I got a letter from my parents this past Friday with a wonderul surprise in it.	That's great, what did they surprise you with?
Just a little spending cash.  Nothing outrageous, but enough to take the wife out and have a good time with.	That's nice, what did they do?
Last night I was walking home from work in a bad part of town, I was a bit scared.	That is terrible. Are you okay?

I agree. It was a bit foolish on my part and I don't want to risk myself nor be worried again. Thanks for the advice.	That's a good idea, but it's hard to avoid areas of high crime in some neighborhoods. You're right to be careful.
When I was 19 I stole money from a good friend in order to buy some food.  He asked me about it and I denied knowing anything.	I am sorry. That must have been hard.

No, I was going to but he said if he every found out I stole it, it wouldn't matter if I paid it back.  So I kept silent, its been 17 years now.	That is very sad.  You are lucky you got away with it.  Did he eventually find out?
I was one percent off from passing my math test, I was devastated.	That is awful. I hope you got a good grade.

I agree, I should of studied harder too. Practice makes perfect!	That's true. It's always better to be over-prepared, rather than to be under-prepared and then trying to cram all night before the test.
Last night I was minding my own business walking down a street in a not so good area of town when someone started to chase me!	That is so scary. Were you able to run?
I managed to get away after a few smart quick turns, but I was shaking and in fear at the end of the chase. It was wild.	That is scary, did they try to follow you home?
I was looking through old stuff in my basement and found my old baseball cards! Finding those was like being a kid all over again!	It is fun to dig up old things.
I used to collect so many when I was younger, it was such an awesome feeling to see them again!	I love collecting sports memorabilia!
I was feeling so optimistic about getting a new job at Houston a while back	I hope you got the job. What kind of job?
Yeah actually, i am still working on it. So much fun!	That is great. What is it about it?
I was so much in awe when i saw Hamilton!	I've never seen the movie. I think I'll watch it this week.
Neither, i am talking about the broadway show :D	That's so cool, I have never seen it, but I have seen Hamilton in the movie. I love it!
I went to the beach other day.. such an awesome feeling standing there	Yeah that's always a great experience, especially if you are in the water.
I most certainly did.. There is something about looking at the calm and glory of the ocean.	That is the best part of summer for me.
I felt so bad about cheating on my science exam, it was terrible	That is terrible.  Did you pass it?
I know, I am disgusted at myself for doing it. I just wanted to pass.	That's a horrible feeling. Did you do well on other subjects?
I'm taking my wife out this coming weekend to dance.	That's a fun time to have with your wife, you should be having a lot of fun.
We haven't been able to go out in quite a long time.  Family and life stuff just gets in the way sometimes.	That sounds like a great time! What kind of dance is she going?
My dog passed away couple months back.. i was heartbroken	I am sorry to hear.  I lost a cat a few months back, and it was really hard.
She got run by a truck.. I felt guilty and blue	That sucks.  It's hard to lose someone you love.
I always get sad thinking about my dad.	It's normal to feel sad.
Yeah.. he did. He had cancer.	Oh, I'm sorry to hear that.  I hope you have some time to grieve and reflect on your father's life.
I went to the beach other day	That is always fun. Did you have fun?
I sure did! the ocean and the breeze gives me such a sense of joy and calm	I'm glad you went to the beach. Did you go to the ocean side or the beach side?
I was so happy that i got to see Hamilton the other day	Oh, that's awesome! I've seen it a few times. What was your favorite part?
Yeah, the same. Lin Manuel is a genius to say the least!	That's amazing! What was your favorite part?
I went to visit my family the other day	I love when people can spend the day with their family.
It was such a joyful experience. They always warm my heart	That's good. I hope you have fun.
A dog chased me through a street the other day	That is not good. Did it get away?

my baby is sleeping, my house is clean... it's just so nice and peaceful right now	Oh that sounds wonderful! I'm glad it's your baby and you're taking care of them!

Something like that. My room was in shambles and the house was falling apart! I was mortified when she asked to come inside.	Oh my, I would have been too.  That is horrible.  How did you deal with that?

5 months ago now. It's really nice here, there are 3 swimming pools	I'm sure that's wonderful. I'm glad you're happy.

Yeah, but it wasn't really a problem, until one night around 11pm. I was changing her diaper. The changing table was in front of a window, and I could hear people running up and down the porch in front of the window and they were banging on the house.	I can imagine! Did you call 911?

I'm not sure. Doors and windows were locked, but I was so relieved when my husband got home.	I'm a youth leader, and just the other day a teen from the group was asked to speak at a local church.	That's awesome. What did he say?
