I was sad when my wife left me	I'm sorry to hear that.  Did she leave for a trip or something?
I just dont know why she would marry me then.	That's terrible. Did she leave because you were not good enough?
My family and I went to the beach on Tues and spent the whole day there.	That's a great time to spend with the family.
One small thunderstorm but other than that great! I'm amazed I didn't really get burnt!	I bet! I've never been.
When someone talks down to me, it makes me sad	That is terrible.  What happens when people talk down to you?
I am just too shy to say anything. I dont know how	I feel you, I'm a shy person too.  What do you think you could say?
I am super joyful when my family comes together to eat dinner	It's great when family members come together, it's always nice to have a time together
Usually once a week. Its a great feeling	That is so nice. It is always a good time when you are with your family.
I was surprised when my parents threw me a big party	I love parties! What did you get for your birthday?
It was. I had a great time	Oh wow, what happened?  Did they not know you were going to be so happy?
I am so annoyed that people are so mean to other people	Oh, I know.  I hate it when people are mean.
That is so true! I dont know where this world is heading.	I agree.  I have never seen people being mean to others.  They should just be kind and respectful.
I get so jealous when my parents don't pay me any attention.	That is understandable, but you could try talking to them about it
I haven't because I don't know how to start that conversation.	Oh, yeah, I've been there.  How do you start?
I was furious when my dog ate the wires to my Television	That is horrible.
Yeah but it will take a few days because I have to wait for my paycheck	That is horrible.  What is wrong with your dog?

So what happens in the middle of the night? I got woken, again, by my upstairs neighbor thumping around. Does she have to be so rude?!	I would have told her to keep quiet. I would have asked her if she was okay. If not, then I would call the police. I wouldn't let it disturb me. I am not sure how long she has been doing this, and it's been at least 2 or more nights.

No, they don't. Well, this time I've had enough. I've told management I want into another apartment and explained exactly why!	I know right, that's crazy! I'm sorry to hear that you're having to deal with this.

Not really, but the alternative is to go slowly mad. These blessed individuals stomp around day and night, screeching into their cellphones - they're horrible.	I am a very trusting person. It gets me in trouble sometimes.	That is good, you are not afraid to let someone in your life that you don't trust.
People take advantage of me	Oh man. I'm sorry to hear that. What kind of stuff do you mean?
I'm only 6 months away from having my AA in Healthcare Administration.	That's a big achievement. You should be proud of yourself.
I really am, I can't wait to start my new career!	It's great that you're working towards your goal. I'm sure you'll be successful.
Going to the dentist always has me on edge. I hate it!	Oh yeah. What's the problem with the teeth?
I know...it's a necessary evil. But it hurts so much!	That is so true! It is like, you know it's coming, but you don't want it to come.
One of my very dear friends got his dream job recently. He was so diligent in finding information and contacts. I so respect what he's achieved.	Oh that's great!  How did he end up there?
Well, it takes perseverance and a bit of luck, but you can do it!	I can see why he's got a job.
Lol, you and me both. You could always marry a Kardashian!	Yeah, I know right. They're all super rich and famous. I just don't really care about that part of life, I'd rather be doing my own thing.

Or someone not quite so objectionable :) Seriously though, I'm so happy for K with his new job.	We started watching a Red Sox game near the end and they were losing. Next thing you know, they were ahead four runs.	That sounds like fun! What happened?
Yes, usually I think so too. But this was really fun to watch and we were so happy because it did not look good at first.	Oh that sounds fun! What happened after?
My car that I hate is going to die soon and I'll be able to get a new one. Score!	That's awesome. What kind of car is it?

I'm thinking something reliable. Maybe a toyota or mazda.	That's awesome!  I've always been a Toyota fan.  I've got a 1993 Toyota Camry.  It's been with me for 15 years.  It just broke down on me last week.  It's a real pain to fix!  I'm thinking of trading it in for something new.  What car are you going with?
Yesterday my husband opened a window and a HUGE black bug flew in!! I almost died!!	That is so gross. I don't know what to do with bugs. I would freak out if I saw one like that!
heck no, i told my husband to deal with it. i ran in my bedroom and locked the door	That is disgusting, what kind of bug was it?

Well, don't you know, one of my neighbors who works for AA was in San Francisco recently and saw some Scottish cheese (I'm Scottish). So she bought some and brought it to me. How nice of her to do that!	That is so sweet!  What kind of cheese was it?

This particular one was a cheddar and it tends to be from smaller producers and is creamier and more flavorful than the cheeses we typically get here.	That's really nice of her! I'm glad you got to try the cheese!

Ooh, I haven't tried Cabot. Must look out for it. The cheddar I normally get is from Tillamook. I think it's from Oregon. Where's Cabot from?	That's cool! I've never had a cheddar from Tillamook before.

I've never done that. Wonder if there's a cheese factory near me. I'm in NC, where the people almost all seem as nice as my kind neighbor!	It's a good idea to check out the website for more information.
my brother would've turned 34 today. he died 2 years ago and It still hurts so much	I am sorry about your loss. I hope you are able to move on.
yes we were. He moved to the different country but we spoke pretty often	I am so sorry for your loss.
I had planned to go to the beach with friends, but it looks like it's going to rain.	Oh no, I hate when the weather doesn't cooperate.
Nah, it said there's be thunder and lightning, so looks like we're stuck inside :(	That is a shame, you should have checked before you went
I spent last weekend with most of my family, they live out of state and i don't see them often.	Oh, that sounds like fun. Did you all have fun together?
I did, Yes. Work has been hectic lately so i was really looking forward to unwinding with them.	Yeah that's cool. I'm sure it was fun for you.
We ate good food, drank wine and went swimming.	I am sure it was good.
It was, kind of hot but not enough to complain about.	That sounds like a great time.  How long have you guys been together?
I hate how our country is so divided right now	I agree. It's hard to see the good in some people's attitudes.
True. I hope we can become less divided in the future and solve things	Yeah I agree.  I think we need to focus on the things we have in common and not so much on the differences.

My father passed away about 2 years ago. It was so very difficult for me and very unexpected. We didn't know he had a life-threatening illness and weren't prepared in any way for his sudden departure from us.	Oh no, I'm so sorry to hear that. I'm so sorry that you have to go through that. I know it's hard to even say the word.

Yes, my family and I are close and we were there for each other. But, my sister had passed away around 6 years before, by committed suicide. The last few years have been very difficult.	Oh my. I am sorry to hear that. I am glad that you have each other to support each other through this difficult time.
I feel like a terrible sibling right now.	I am sure you were a great sibling.

My sister, who lives out of state and i don't see often, was recently in town visiting our dad. I didn't visit with them.	Oh, I bet she was really sad about that. Did you call and apologize for not visiting?
I am going to a concert very soon.	I love live music.  Is this one of your favorites?
Imagine Dragon and Grace Vanderwhall, do you know them?	I do not. I will have to look up their music. I am not familiar with either of these bands.

Yes she was.	Our new property management person is remarkably efficient. She emailed me details of a conversation we had yesterday. The others promise the earth and don't deliver!	It sounds like your property management is doing a pretty great job.

It is. I've been trying to switch apartments for months and this is the first time someone has actually done anything about it.	I hope you find a place you can call home soon! I hope you can get your issues with the management company resolved soon.
Absolutely! I move September 1st. No more stompy screechy neighbors at 3 am!!	School for my kids started again this past Thursday.	It is a lot of work, but it is a lot of fun.

It was good. I am dealing with a mixture of both emotions about them being back in school. I was happy I had all the supplies, clothes, shoes, and other odds and ends in time.	It is good for them to go back to school.  I know how that can feel.
I had planned a beach trip about a month before we actually went.	I bet it was fun.
We went to Virginia Beach earlier this week. I was so giddy up that whole month I could barely contain myself.	That is so exciting! What did you do?
My husband, 2 kids and my mother. My kids had never been to the beach.	That sounds like a lot of fun! What did you do there?
I bought a ticket last week for the lottery, when it was over 100 million dollars.	That is crazy! I bet on it.
I was so excited watching the numbers being drawn, but no I didn't win. But someone did! I'm sure they were happy.	That's awesome, but I'm still waiting to hear if I'll win.

True, but it would be fun spending that money.	My husband just found out he will start getting a monthly bonus! This was unexpected and great news	That's so awesome!  Congratulations!  How long will it be for?
It sure does. It came as a shock, but a pleasant one.	It's always nice to see that the hardworking people in our world get to have a little bit of a reward
I just went today to visit my son in his new house.	It sounds like you have a son.  That's a big accomplishment.
It was great! He has saved for so long to buy it.	That sounds great! How long has your son been looking to buy the house?
So tonight we are suppose to go eat out as a family but I cant get a single one of my family members to agree on a place.  So frustrating!	That is terrible. What kind of places do you eat?

That's actually not a bad idea.  Wish I had come up with that earlier.  It seems everyone wants something different.	I can't understand why you guys can't agree on anything. I've tried to be patient, but it's getting so frustrating.

Im going to have to sue that for next week.  I think this week they can all go make PB&J since they want to be difficult.	I'm not sure what you mean by that.  You want to sue for making PB&J.  That is a pretty silly idea.
I guess that way the wallet wins every once and awhile too!  lol	I'm so happy that it is Friday!	Oh yeah. I'm happy it's Friday too, I don't know why we don't have a day off more often.

Somewhat, I work 4 10 hour shifts and have a random off day during the week. Yesterday was my off day. What about you?	That is great news!  I am also off today.  I work a lot and have no one around me.  I am a little happy.  Friday is a good time.  Friday, I'm a little sad.
feels disappointed because my friend fights with me	Yeah, that's a pretty common problem with friends.  What did they fight about?
no i can't because i love him a lot	That's understandable, it is hard to deal with someone you care about, but you should try to find ways to make your relationship work.

I have Lupus and it is getting worse.  I asked my doctor for a chance to try a new diet I found that is suppose to help me with it.	I have lupus as well and I am trying to get my diet to be more healthy.

yes, but they are quite powerful which I am trying to avoid.  I am already on one and I am hoping that through this diet I can get off b/c the next steps won't be fun	I hope it works for you! I'm sorry to hear that.

Some time ago, there was a terrible tornado that came through my city. It destroyed many homes, a school and some people died. I was so fearful and petrified it would come by our home and destroy it, or harm my familY!	Oh wow that must have been so terrifying.  I'm glad you are safe.  What city was it in?
No, they are so awful! They can destroy so much.	Yeah, I've seen some terrible tornadoes. I hope you're okay.
My husband took me to get a new wedding band recently	That's awesome! I'm in a similar situation.
I didn't know ahead of time! Mine had broken a bit and he saved up to get me a new one.	It sounds like you are very happy.
I love the holidays. Driving around looking at decoration is my favorite.	That is so fun. I love decorating the house with the family.
Christmas. It makes me miss my moms decor.	That's nice. I love the holiday too, especially Christmas.
I have a wonderful sister-in-law.  who is always there for me when I need her	That's great! What do you do with your sister-in-law?
I feel so lucky to have her as a sister-in-law and a friend.  She is always there to offer a supporting ear and encouraging word.	That is great. What kind of person is she?

A few weeks ago, we finally got a chance to get back to the beach for our vacation. But, it rained several days, so we didn't get to spend as much time at the beach as we wanted, which sucked. We were really looking forward to it.	It's always a bummer when the weather doesn't cooperate.  I'm sorry that happened.  I hope you get to go back soon.  It's always better when it's sunny.

Oh, no, it was about a 7 hour drive! My daughter was quite young when we went and didn't remember the first trip and she's a teenager now. So, a long time since we first went.	It's a good thing that it rained. I'm sure you'll go again soon!
My husband just a promotion at work he was really wanting	I hope you both get what you want!
I know..ha ha!  He worked so hard for this and I am so proud of him.	I am glad he got the promotion.

We took a vacation recently and had to leave my daughter's teenage boyfriend a key to our house so he could take care of the pets. He's a good young man, so we didn't feel uncomfortable anything would come up missing.	That is nice! It is good to be kind to people.  I would never do something like that.

We didn't have much choice, as we had an outdoor dog and indoor cat, so if we didn't, we'd come back to not having pets. But, I wouldn't just let anybody, that's for sure!	Oh, that's a little creepy.  I'm sorry you had to go through that.  I can understand why you would be a little uncomfortable.
My mother-in-law once told a secret of mine that she promised she would never tell	That must have made you feel bad.  Did you tell her?
I know it really hurt me and I had to work on trusting her again with other things	That is really bad. What did she tell you?
One night when my children and I came home, I saw a shadow inside! I was so fearful and afraid!	That's terrifying. What was inside?
It was so scary! Luckily, it was actually my shadow! The light made my shadow show up, but it first appeared to be an intruder!	That is a funny story. Did you call the police?
Last weekend, my family and I enjoyed a nice meal together, and then watched a movie. It was a relaxing time at home, just enjoying each other's company.	That sounds like a great time!
Yes, it was drama free and a relaxing time.	I'm sorry that happened to you.  Did you guys watch a movie about drama?
My dog, riley had to be put to sleep due to congestive heart failure	Oh no, that is so sad. I'm so sorry. I'm so sorry. I know how much you love your pet.
It was one of the hardest things I had to go through but I know that Riley is not suffering anymore so that helps	That must have been hard for you, I know how much you love your dogs.

I didn't tell my friend when her boyfriend hit on me. She was in a bad spot and needed him for financial support, and that's why I didn't tell her. But, I still felt so bad about it.	That is very kind of you, it would have been nice if she knew.
Well, she had custody of her handicapped grandchild and no job, plus she was very much in love with him. I thought it would just make things worse for her.	That was very kind of you.
I am trying a new diet to treat my Lupus.	I have lupus, it's a real pain in the neck!
I am nervous b/c so much rides on if this works or not.  If it doesn't than I have to take some really powerful meds that i would rather not take	I hope it works out for you.

There's a coworker that will not follow instructions on work assignments, so she makes many mistakes. It's so frustrating and aggravating, since it causes others more work.	That's terrible. You need to tell him to stop.
Exactly! You try nicely to explain it to her over and over, but she won't listen. Such a nuisance!	It's like she thinks it's an accident or she's doing it on purpose.
My mother picked my daughter up for school to take in the morning, and found her cat dead. It was so hard for my daughter and made us all very upset.	That is awful! I'm sorry to hear that.
Yes, she was only about 9, and loved her cat so much. It broke my heart to see her so upset!	That's terrible!
I decided to play the lottery the other day and won.	Oh wow, that's awesome! How much did you win?
Not normally, so I was quite surprised.	Did you win the jackpot?
$1000. It was enough to help me catch up on my bills. So I was happy.	That's awesome, how much did it cost you to get the money?

Thank you, that was the first time I have ever won anything like that. I almost passed out.	I have a bad experience at the supermarket the other day.	That's a bad experience. Did you get your money back?
Someone backed into my new car.	Oh my gosh that is horrible. I am sorry that happened to you. I would have gotten so upset.

Yes, they ran! I was so mad when I got to the car and saw it.	Many years ago, we were at a friend's house and one of her friend's was there and she was drunk. My husband was very insistent on helping her, but I felt he was being a bit to 'helpful'. It made me a bit angry!	I bet. Did you tell him that it was wrong?

Well, she was attractive and at the time, I thought he was thinking that too. But, I know now he was just trying to help her get to a safe place, since she was falling down. But, it was hard to see it at that time lol	I know that feeling well! It can be hard to see the bigger picture, but you should never let your emotions get you into a situation where it's bad. You should be the voice that helps her!
I had a bad morning when I went to check my mail.	Oh, I hope it wasn't anything bad! Did you check if it was a scam?
Especially when you find your mailbox laying in about 10 pieces after someone knocked it down last night.	I'm sorry to hear that, did anyone get your mail?
Not really. I live in town, but it's a small town.	That's terrible, I hope the person who did that is held accountable.
That's a good idea. I might do that. We don't have a camera because we don't normally have any troubles.	That is true, but you never know.
My aunt came to visit today, we went out for mexican food!	I love mexican food, it's one of my favorite foods. What was your favorite part?
Yes, kind of upset she was only able to stay in town for a few hours, she is on a road trip!	That is nice of her to come visit. I hope she had a great time and a safe trip.
I have a big exam for college coming up, I have been studying day and night.	I am sure you are going to crush it.
It is for my molecular biology class, I feel pretty good that I am going to Ace it.	It is a great feeling to know you are prepared!
I went and saw a hockey game today, It was really exciting.	That sounds like fun. Did you like it?
No, I use to play growing up. I haven't been to a game since graduating highschool.	That was fun! Did you get to meet any hockey players?
I was on a run today, and saw a loose dog but couldn't catch it before it ran off!	That is terrible! I hate when that happens!

Maybe if you live in Central Texas...haha! But I was so worried about that small dog getting hit!	I would've been worried about it too, I hate seeing animals running around without a leash.  It was a nice run and I would've wanted to see the dog but it was too fast and it ran off!  I'm sure the dog is now running around the city!
I got some bad news today, my dad passed away.	It's tough, but it will get better.  You can't stay down for long.
Thank you, I am a mess. It is still hasn't hit me that he passed away.	That is terrible news, I am sorry for your loss.
Its so quiet in my house, my husband is out of town for work.	I bet it gets a little lonely.  Is he gone for long periods of time?
True, I'm trying but keep hearing creepy noises. Guess I need to turn the TV up louder haha	That is not a good sign. I would get out of your house as fast as you can!
I got some great news today! My husband got a better paying job offer!	That's great! I'm so happy for you!
Not sure yet, but itll help us life more comforatbly! We move to his hometown in November when he gets out of Army!	Well that's good for him and for you!
My daughter is in highschool but took a college course this summer and got an A!	That's really nice of you, what course was it?
That is very good. You should be proud of her.	I ate way too many sweets today!	I know the feeling. What kind?
Thanks! Being on a diet is hard, espically with family in town!	I know, I feel the same way, but I have a lot of family around.
I was running today and felt like this car was following me..	I bet you felt that way.  Did you see anyone else?
Yes it was, I think I need to start carrying pepper spray or something	I hate when people do that. I hope you didn't get into an accident!
Im watching the show The Bold Type, my favourtie characters dad died :(	I am so sorry to hear that.  I have never seen it but I have seen some of the episodes.  It's a very good show.
Yes, it's a great girly drama! Reminds me of Sex in the City but Modern.	I haven't seen the show yet but I've heard it's a good one. I'll definitely watch it.
It's been a great night! I'm just relaxing with a cold drink and my favourite show!	That is the best. What is the show?
Yes defenitly, It dosen't get better then this! My daughter has been fast asleep since 8pm.	Yeah that sounds good. I hope you guys are both happy!
My family is moving from Texas to Arkansas in a few months, Im worried for the change.	Oh no. Are you moving to the south?
My husband is getting out of the Army and moving back to his hometown where he has a few job offers! Big changes coming..	Oh no, I hope everything goes well for you and your family.
I recently moved into a new home.	I'm sorry to hear that. I bet it's not fun!
Yes, there are a lot of kids that our daughter can play with.	That's great! What kind of kids are there?
We had been saving for 4 years to buy a bigger house. We had outgrown our other home.	I had a doctors appointment today.	It was necessary?
I was so mad because I had to wait a hour after my appointment time before they called me back.	That's terrible, did you get to see them?

I agree! Everyone was so annoyed because we were all waiting forever.	I had just moved in to my new apartment, and every night this skinny little tabby came begging for food at my door.	That's so cute! I bet you had to feed him a lot!
At first I tried to resist, but I ended up adopting him!	I love animals. I'm sure he was lonely.
I received a wrong number call last night at 2 in the morning.	That is so creepy. Did you answer it?
Yes! It was so aggravating. They would not believe me when I kept telling them it was the wrong number.	That's not good. Did you try to call back?
She did twice before she finally believe me that there was no Bret there.	I recently found out that I am having baby number 4.	That's so exciting! What's your name?
Wow! That is great. We were thrilled because we didn't know if we were going to have anymore and nature just decided for us.	That is great! Congratulations!

Yes they are. They make life worth living.	Halloween is quite a big holiday where I live. People get really in to their costumes!	It's always fun to dress up in costume. I like to dress up in a costume for Halloween, but my costume for Halloween was the only thing my kids were excited to wear.
It's peoples creativity that makes it so entertaining. Last year I went as a plague doctor, and everyone agreed it was terrifying!	I have a great sense of humor, so I love Halloween costumes.

Last year we lost our home of 20 years to a house fire.	Oh no, I'm so sorry to hear that. I've lost my home twice in my lifetime, and it was my home. It's so hard to see your home go up in smoke and ashes.
Yes, thankfully everybody was safe. Nobody was even home when it happened.	That is terrible. I am so sorry that happened to you.
No, we just bought another house closer to town. It was sad losing everything that we had.	When me and my friend got lost in the desert, I thought we were done for.	Oh no, how did you escape?
Only a couple of hours. We flagged down an old Chevy truck and the man driving got us sorted out.	I am glad you were okay!
I went tonight to meet my daughters teacher.	It's always a little nerve-wracking when you meet the teacher of a child.
Yes, I think she will be a great teacher. She showed us her plan for the year and I think it was great.	That's great.  I hope you all have a good year.  I am sure you will.
Thanks so much. I completely agree.	I just finished watching the Saw movie.	I've heard that one was pretty bad.
I hated it! I didn't want to watch it but my husband did. The gore is just too much!	That's too bad, I've been in the same situation. I didn't like it, but I was a kid and I loved horror movies.
Yep! I feel kind of sick to my stomach now from watching it.	I recently went down memory lane was looked at all my high school yearbooks.	I love high school year books. What was your favorite year?
Well.... maybe not as awesome. lol But I do try to keep in shape. It was good seeing all my old friends.	I am sorry you were not happy with the memories of your school days.
I do a lot of them but some have moved away and we just lost touch.	That sucks. I've lost a few friends over time too. I'm not as good of a dancer as I used to be.
That's a good idea!	Oh no, I'm so sorry to hear that. I know how it is when you lose touch. I hope they stay in touch.
I had this guy flag me down today after leaving the store.	That is pretty cool. What did he do?
I was scared at first and then he hollered and pointed to the top of my car and I had left my purse on it. Boy, did my face get red.	That sounds scary. Did you get it back?
My daughter just bought her first car on her own.	It sounds like she is growing up to be a great person!
It's a 2008 Mustang. She worked the last two summers to buy it.	That is awesome! I'm so proud of you for her hard work!
She is super excited to start school now and show it off.	I'm leaving tomorrow to go on vacation!	That's exciting.  What are you doing on vacation?
We are going to Daytona and Orlando for 10 days.	It's going to be a great time! I've never been to Daytona.
I sure hope so! We've been planning this trip for a year.	I love Daytona!

My husband and I have a fun weekend trip planned soon. We are going to go to the casino for the weekend, just the two of us. We are really looking forward to it.	That's fun! I'm sure you will have a good time! What kind of casino will you be going to?
Yes, it's been awhile since we had just some time for us. Plus, we love Blackjack!	I love Blackjack as well, I'm glad you guys are going to have some fun!
I have a very good friend and her live-in boyfriend of 5 years hit on me! I'm married, and he didn't care. He sickens me!	That sucks. I would not have reacted that way.
Yes, I was really surprised and I find it terrible behavior.	That sounds terrible. Did you try talking to them about it?

We went on a vacation a few weeks ago, and it really made me think back to our last vacation. It was with my father, the last one before he passed away.	I am sorry about your father. What kind of vacation were you on?
I did, but of course, wished I had more time. He passed away unexpectedly, so I was going over that vacation in my mind too. I miss him.	That sounds sad, but it sounds like it was a good trip.
I was pleasantly shocked the other day when I won on a lottery ticket! I hardly ever win and I won $200!	That's awesome! I love winning lottery.

I just tucked it back for a rainy day. But, I may splurge with it this weekend, since it was unexpected.	I'm so happy for you, you must be so relieved. I have a lottery ticket too and I haven't won anything yet.
My husband sure did surprise me with his handiness and hard work around the house last week. He was able to accomplish so much work in a few days!	That's awesome! What did he do?
Ok	I was the first person to receive a pretigious award at my college after years of the award being on offer.	That sounds amazing, what award was it?
At the department office back at the school.	I hope you got to enjoy your prize.

One of my coworkers really ticked me off one day. She decided she would delegate some work to me by slamming on my desk and demanding I do it. She had some nerve!	I hate when that happens, it makes you mad and want to do it yourself.

Yes, she doesn't have the right to do that. I have been that many years longer than her, and it was her work! I let her know it too.	That sounds like she was trying to get away with something she didn't.

One year my cousin wasn't going to get her young son anything for Christmas. It broke my heart so my husband and I bought his Santa gifts that year.	That's nice of you guys! I'm sure your son appreciated the gift.
The little guy deserved a Christmas and we really loved him.	Oh, that's so sweet. What was he little for?
When I went to the fair last year, I tripped on a large cord they had going across the walkway. It was a long, running fall! I wanted to hide!	It must have been scary. Did you get hurt?
Scuffed knees, but mainly my pride. I was also in front an attractive guy I knew so it was even worse.	Oh, that is a funny story.  Did he ever find out?

My husband and I are at a point in our lives, we are able to save, afford all that we need and save for retirement. I'm so appreciate we can, as I know many aren't able to do that.	I can only dream of that!

Yes, we have been working hard, as well as not always getting all the extras we would like at times. But, it's worth having some financial freedom!	I am glad to hear that you guys have that financial stability
One day at work while I was pregnant, I fell! Luckily, the baby and I weren't hurt, but I wanted to waddle away so fast!	That's crazy!  I've never fallen like that!
Yes, it really was quite so!	That's crazy! I'm sure the baby was so excited to meet you!
There are times I feel a bit alone and down. My husband has to travel out of town for work quite often.	It can be lonely when you are married to one person. I'm sure you miss him!
Well, yes, of course. But, that isn't quite the same, is it.	I am sure it's not the same as having someone with whom you share life.

My children recently started school again and it made me feel a bit apprehensive. They are growing up so quick, and I know it won't be long before they sadly move out of the house :(	I can't wait for them to be older and move out, but it's hard to let go of them as they grow older.  I hope they stay close.  How old are they?  Are they in elementary, middle, or high school?  How old are they?
For sure! But, it flies by before you know it. I get my nerves on edge when I think about them all moved out of the house.	I am glad they are moving out of the house.
Despite working until a few hours before, I scored highly on the ACT the first time I took it back in high school years ago.	That's awesome! Did you take it at least twice more?
Thanks. I thought I'd do poorly because I was tired.	It's good that you were tired. I'm not a fan of taking exams, but I guess that's what you have to do.
Not that long ago, my husband planned a secret trip for us! I didn't have a clue he was doing it and was pleasantly shocked. It was so much fun!	It was so sweet! Did you go on a cruise or something?

We just took a weekend trip to Tunica, MS. We stayed at a really nice casino hotel and just played some Blackjack, enjoyed good food and each other's company!	That is nice. What was your favorite part of the trip?
I lied to my mother one day about where I was going. It made me feel pretty bad and have a bad conscience.	I would feel the same way.  Did you apologize to her?

She didn't want me going with that friend, but I wanted to go, so I lied to her. I was much younger then.	I'm so sorry that you had to deal with that. I know that it's a hard lesson to learn but sometimes it's necessary to do what you think is right even if it's hard.
I won a free trip to Florida. It's not the best vacation, but I'll take it for free.	That sounds like a good deal
I've been to Florida many times before so it wears on you.	I'm jealous.  Where in Florida do you plan on going?
I won a lottery for a small amount of money.	I love lottery tickets!  What kind of lottery was it?
No, I wish. It was only a few hundred dollars.	That would be nice, but it was only a few dollars.
A good friend of mine moved away recently and we lost contact. I really wish we would still speak.	That sucks.  I have a good friend from college who moved away last year.
That's a good idea. Maybe I'll try that soon.	I hope your friend calls you back.
Someone was speeding on the road and I got into an accident with them. My car was totalled because of their carelessness.	That's horrible.  Did you get the person's license?

Yes, but not as much as the car was worth and it wasn't an enjoyable situation.	Oh, my god.  That is horrible.  I'm sorry to say this, but it's a miracle you are okay.  You must be so relieved.  I'm not even sure if I can ever go back to driving.
I let a friend watch my dog for a week while I was out of town. I would've been devastated if anything happened to him.	That's a pretty bad situation.  How long were they watching?
I hope so. I've only had my dog for a short time and this is my first time away from him.	Oh that's so sad.  I hope everything was alright.
I have been feeling great about life recently. My relationships have been going very well	That's great to hear. It's good to feel good about life. What kind of relationships?

I am not, but I have a person I am very fond of. Are you?	Yeah I am. I have been feeling great about life recently. My relationships have been going very well I am not, I just got out of a relationship that lasted for 6 years. I am looking forward to this new chapter of my life. I have a lot to be grateful for.
I got a surprise gift in the mail yesterday.	I am happy for you, that's awesome!
A gorgeous vase. It's so pretty. I have no idea who sent it.	It was my sister! I was so happy. I was expecting something from my boyfriend, but it was my sister.
Yes, I love flowers. I can't wait to fill it up.	My sister broke my vase. I was pretty enraged!	That is terrible. Did you talk to her?
I scolded her but then told her it was okay, but it's not the biggest deal!	Yeah, it's the little things that can be really annoying.
I'm am upset today because my daughter who lives really far away called and said her baby was admitted to the hospital.	That's sad! How old was the baby?
He was premature so he's been having some breathing issues. I hate not being there.	Oh no! That's so sad, I hope everything turns out well!
I'm so taken by the talents of contestants on the show Face Off -- have you ever seen it?	That's a great show. I haven't seen it in a while.
Their abilities to both imagine and create their characters is incredible!	I've seen it! I love it! I'm always looking for something new to watch!
A lot people know Toys-R-Us has completely shut down not long ago.	That's right. I was sad to see them close.
Yeah, a lot of my friends and I got to thinking of all our memories there. Really makes you think back.	It really does. It's a shame they shut down the stores.
I feel so bad, I forgot my sisters birthday...	Oh that's terrible.  I hope she didn't mind as much as I do.
Yes I plan on it, its just been stressful time at home with a toddler, it slipped my mind	Yeah, that's what happens when you get busy with work and kids.
I love my husband so much I could never cheat on him.	That is so true, you should be with the person you love.
Yea, I wouldnt want to hurt him, i cant understand anyone who does.	Yeah, I think that's right. I don't think cheating is a good thing to do.
It can be really tough when your husband and teenagers have electronics.	I'm sure that is not fun.  What do they do?
I do for family time but sometimes I can sit in a full room and still feel no one is there	That is a lot of time to sit in a room. I wish they could have some more time together.
Tomorrow is my husbands Birthday!	That's nice! How old is he?
Yes, we are going out for a nice dinner. We haven't been on a date in months!	I hope he enjoys it!
I love the holidays, that make think back to being a kid.	That's great. What is your favorite holiday?

Yea, that would really be great. Or maybe we'd get bored.	Yeah, that is the thing. You get so used to the holidays, you forget what it's all about. I think the best part is that you get to see all the family you haven't seen in a long while.
There is a big storm going on in my town right now!	I have seen that before, it can be scary.
I don't, it makes me nervous with the strong winds and rain!	That is bad news. Are you safe?
My favorite game has an expansion on Monday, I can't wait.	I'm not much of video games, but I love playing them.
World of Warcraft, It's been my favorite for years.	I've been a huge World of Warcraft fan too. What's your favorite expansion?
I just got a promotion at my job!	That's awesome!  Congratulations!
I work in Human Resources for a big company, I wasn't expecting the promotion! Feel Blessed :)	It's good for you to get that promotion!
I really like every shelf in my house to be arranged just so.	I know! It's like a work of art.

I do, everything is in it's place. It thoroughly bothers me when someone puts random stuff on them, like cups or papers.	I understand why you like that. It is nice to be able to find what you are looking for easily.
I just found out my husband is cheating on me..	Oh no.  That is awful.  Why didn't he tell you?

A few months, I'm not sure what my next move is. Staying in a hotel for a few days to think.	I can't imagine what you're going through right now, but at least you have your time to think about things you want to do in the future.
My daughter is finally fully potty trained!	That's so cool! I've been trying to get her to potty for hours!
Yes, I am very happy as well! No more buying diapers haha	That's awesome! How many?
So, my new puppy is adorable though maybe not as amazing yet as yours.	Oh I see!  What's her name?
She's so cute and fun, i love her already.	I bet you do! I have two and they are both such sweethearts.
I started doing more research on salaries for the degree I'll have in 6 months.	Oh that's interesting.  What degree is it?
It seems to be about 60,000 per year just out of college. I am eager to see if the statistics are correct.	It's great that you are so enthusiastic about your future.
I know it's silly, but my friend got something I wanted in a game the other day, bit sad.	Oh that is sad. What was it?
I guess, little things at times right?	That can be tough, I'm sure you were feeling a little jealous.
I watched The Lion King today with my daughter, reminded me of my childhood.	I love The Lion King.  I haven't seen it in a while.  It's so much fun to watch.
Yes! I'm excited for that as well. I watched the movie with my mom when it first came out!	It's great you have a connection with your daughter.
5	I don't know what you are talking about.
Opps. Ok, i mean that I was sad the other day because a friend is moving.	That is too bad.  What happened?
not to far, but it's still sad to see her go.	Oh no. I have been there before.
I have been having a rough week!	It can be tough when it comes to the week, I hope you get back on track soon!
Yes but I am afraid I might loose my job..	That is terrible, how long have you been working for the company?
I hate how our country is right now.	That's awful. What happened?
People just can't seem to get along, makes me sad.	It is sad too. We need to work together as one nation and not be so divided. I don't know how we get there though.
I spent all weekend alone, wish my family lived closer.	That sucks, do you like having them around?
My family is over 2,000 miles away in Alaska, its tough!	That is a long way to go. I have a family member in the same city but they live far away in another part of the state. I know how it feels.
My husband woke up with his face swollen and a terrible toothache	Oh no! Did he get it from eating something?
Not yet, but I was his bedside nurse all day. Anything he needed I was sure to get.	That is terrible! I hope he gets it checked out.
Ah, it's been rough. My dog passed away two nights ago.	That's terrible. What was his name?
Thank you, she was 12 years old so I knew it was coming but still shook up about it.	Yeah, that's a terrible way to start the week
I hate when it storms so bad the power goes out	I know the feeling!  I was in the middle of a storm last year and the power went out.
I agree.	I know!  I hate the thunderstorm, and it always makes me feel like the world is ending.
I found a hundred dollar bill when cleaning my closet!	Oh my! I bet that was fun!
No! I'm not sure where it came from! and I live alone :O	That is so cool, I love finding those kinds of things. What was it used for?
There was a huge spider on my wall, it ran away before I could kill it..	Oh wow!  I would have been so upset!  I hate spiders.
Me too, I think it was a wolf spider. I hope I can sleep tonight	Oh wow. Did it leave a mark on you?
I'm so nervous, have a final exam on Tuesday!	That's so exciting! What are you studying for?
Yes, I have been studying a lot but still worried. I need to get a good grade!	That's a lot of pressure! I hope you do well!
I have to give a speech on Thursday.	That's awesome! Are you going to give it on a specific topic?
Yes. But mentally I am never ready to give a speech if im being honest.	I am sure you'll do great.  You'll be nervous, but you'll do your job!
It's on local politics. Not a fun subject either!	I sold some stuff I didnt need last week.	I am sure it was for good reasons!
Yea, enought to have great weekened anyway.	I love selling stuff. I used to do it all the time when I was young
I think that my husband and me have so much faith in each other.	I am sure you do, you have been married for 20 years.
I know, I cant do that. I think it's very important to be honest in your love life.	I know what you mean. I think that's what makes it easier to keep things going when you're having trouble.
Ten years ago now, a massive hurricane forced my family to evacuate. I didn't know if there would be anything to come back to.	That is terrible. I am sure it was a very scary experience.
Pretty messed up, but the house was still standing.	I've never had a house in a hurricane, that's scary.

was travelling 14 hours internationally. First flight got delayed and the airline would not apologize and provide altenative	Yeah that's so frustrating. I've had flights like that happen before and they just ignore you. I'm so tired and irate.
British airways. they claimed because they dont have ties to the connecting, they could not	That is so rude of them. I would not fly them.

I've felt excited when I found out I had won a place on a prestigious creative writing course, taught by someone who I knew could help me in ways that I would I not be able to through self-study alone.	That sounds amazing. What is it that you want to do?

Thank you for the kind words. You know what? It was, but not for the reasons I imagined! It turned out that everyone in the class developed a really close bond and while the advice from the teacher was wonderful, it was the lifelong friendships and mutual edits that the students do for each other that has proved equally special!	That's really cool. I'm glad that it worked out well for you.
I think it was :)	I like going fishing, it reminds me of when I would go with my dad when I was a kid.	That's cool, I love fishing.
I do, I have a 6 month old boy. How about you?	Yeah I love fishing. I've never been very good at it though, but I enjoy it.
I dropped all my food in the cafeteria the other day. Everybody was staring at me.	That sucks. Did anyone laugh?
No, it was at work.	Oh my goodness!  That is terrible.

I once accidently ran down the battery on my car when I mid-judged how long I could run the radio for without the engine running. It was 5am and I was in the middle of nowhere. I called the first person I could think of who could help and they came with crocodile clips and recharged the battery. I felt so grateful to be on the receiving end of a kind act. I was also embarrassed that I had let that happen and I learned from it!	That's really nice of them to do that for you.

Yeah for sure! It was one of those things that once it happens once then you definitely know the limits of the car's battery power without engine running - so you make sure it won't happen again!	Oh, yeah, I've had those moments too where I'm thinking about the battery running out and it's too late.
I'm ready for college football to start. I can't wait for kickoff weekend!	That's awesome! What team are you rooting for?
Auburn Tigers	I'm a football fan!
I did something really foolish at the grocery store yesterday.	Oh no, I hope you were not hurt.
I was reaching for some pasta sauce and knocked a few of them over. They shattered on the ground a such a huge mess that two workers had to come mop it up.	I would have been very mad!
I can't believe he did it! I just went to my brother's graduation ceremony at Princeton.	That was cool. Did he go there?
Oh yeah, definitely! He put in a ton of work and it all paid off!	That is awesome! Congrats to your brother.

I once had a long walk home from the railway station with two very heavy bags. It turned out that another person had also missed the last bus and had to walk much of the journey with me as his home was in the same direction as mine. The two bags I had had some expensive DJ equipment but they were VERY heavy so when they guy who had to walk home the same way said he would help by carrying one of the bags I trusted him! He didn't disappoint, he helped me get home earlier and without a bad back; while the kindness of strangers made what a potentially bad night to a reasonably pleasant one - all down to trust!	That is really nice of them!

It's one of those things that in the day time you might expect but this was like 1am so I'm sure he would have wanted to get home as soon as he could but he chose to make his night harder to make my night easier.	Yeah that is the kind of thing I like to hear about, the kind of kindness that makes life a little bit better
I was really mad when I walked out my door the other day to go to work and my neighbors big dog jumped up on me and knocked me over.	Oh that is a horrible thing to see. Did you yell at the dog?

Yes, I hurt my back and couldn't even go to work. Shouldn't the dog be on a leash. Ugh!	I know right! I was so mad! I was like "what the heck! You're a dog, not a petting zoo! Why are you jumping over there and knocking people over?" I hope they are responsible and they will be more careful in the future.
My transmission in my car went out the other day, maybe it won't be too expensive to repair.	That is terrible. I have had that happen to my car.
Yes they are. I had just put a down payment on a house too, so my money is tied up.	That sucks, hope you don't get into too much trouble with it.
I am fuming. I saw someone key my car while I was at the grocery store the other day.	That is terrible. Did they steal anything else?
No, I was checking out when I saw it happen. I didn't even know them. I don't know why anyone would do something like that.	That's terrible.  Did they leave?

Had my first trekking expereince in the canyon last week. It payed off using all the things i learned during the scouts when i was small!	It is very exciting, I am a little jealous, I have not been trekking for so long.
I did. the scenes were really rewarding. also felt good to have all the tools and skills necessary	I'm glad you had a good time.  Did it go well?

Last week I saw a three piece rock band that sounded so huge that I was sure they were playing with a backing track. I asked their tech, and checked their equipment and guess what!? It was just them!	That's so cool. I love rock music.
I'm sorry if I was unclear, I mean that the band were playing completely live (with no backing track).	That is awesome. What was their music?
So I learned to bowl using two hands yesterday and it was my best game ever!	That is so cool! I love bowling!

Yes, very! It's also way more fun for me to put spin on the ball than traditional style bowling.	That is really cool!  I have never been good at anything, but I have learned to bowl.  It's a great way to be able to play with friends.  What's your favorite part about it?
So I came home to dog poop everywhere yesterday! It was gross!	That is disgusting. I hate it when that happens.
We were only gone for 2 hours! You just can't leave them alone I guess	That's so sad. Did you call your dog?
I am starting a new phase in my life. Completed all debt and off to a new start	That's awesome. What kind of debt are we talking about?
yes very. but I know that it will be good.	I'm glad for your good luck
Thanks! I hope to learn from my mistake and continue to progress	That's great! I'm sure you'll learn from your mistakes.
I try to be. it can be difficult on some days, but I think I have a good attitude towards most things	Yeah, I know what you mean. It's tough sometimes. But you have to keep going.
I'm feeling very motivated and good about school this year. I think I can get much better grades this time.	That's great! What's your major?
Thanks! I've realized that school is extremely important and I can't squander my opportunity away.	That's great! I'm sure you will do great!

My friend bought a house in a very cheap market town and 6 months later a very walthy company opened an enormous regional HQ there. His house has doubled in price and he has paid off all his debt and now is very well off. I'm pleased for him but envy a little luck	That is great!

Yeah. It is one of those strange moments where a place can go from being a place in the cheapest third of housing markets to being in the most expensive third in just a couple years!	I can imagine. I have had to sell a house for a lot of money. I'm glad you got the good luck you needed!
So yesterday I went bowling and the ball got stuck on my hand... I went with it.	Oh no! That's not fun, what did you do?
No, but I was shocked at how a small 12 pound ball can carry you down the lane due to the momentum. It was quite funny.	I love the humor.
My brother got a nice new toyota 4runner for his first car! I'm lowkey kind of mad at him for it.	Yeah that is a nice car. I bet you were happy for him though?

No kidding! I hope he understands the value of it!	That's a pretty sweet car! I'm sure he will. I have a 2000 Honda Civic and it has held me together for a long time. I'm not sure I could afford another car right now, though.
I just got a new car and I absolutely love it! My old car was a piece of crap so an upgrade is awesome!	I have never had to upgrade before. I am glad you got a good one.
I am very happy! It's nice to know that I don't have to worry about if my car is going to start or not either.	That's awesome! I have been wanting to get a new car.
I was listening to a throwback hits playlist and it brought back memories from the good ol days.	I love that! Throwback hits. I like that too.
It was mostly hip hop and R&B. Stuff like Nelly Furtado, 2pac, etc.	It's always good to reminisce about the past.
My grandson was admitted to the hospital the other day. It's so hard waiting around for test results.	That's terrible! How old was he?
They still have more tests to do. Hopefully they will know something by tomorrow but it's so nerve wracking.	I know it can't be good...

I am so excited - after a year of misery due to my loud, inconsiderate upstairs neighbors I'm finally moving into a new apartment!	That's great! I'm sure you'll love it! I've moved a few apartments recently, it's a lot of work.
I just can't wait! I've seen the new place, and it backs onto a forest, so there'll be peace there, at least!	That's great, you're lucky to get away from them!

Yes it is. And friends are going to help me with moving. It'll be great fun - we can have a bit of a party while they help me unpack :)	I was bowling last week and I accidentally used the person's custom ball that was next to me!	That must've been frustrating, I'm sure it was!
It was a she! And she just glared at me. I felt awful when I realized my mistake.	I bet that made you feel terrible.  I've done that before too and I felt awful.

We have a family reunion planned for next week. I am really looking forward to catching up with everyone, especially my brother and sister.	I love family reunions! I haven't had one in a while, but I'm excited! What kind of family reunion are you having?
It's been over a year and we don't get to talk very often because everyone is always so busy. I'm so excited.	That is great! I hope everyone has fun!
I recently hit a new personal record at the gym! I was very excited.	I'm happy for you! What's your personal record?

Thank you! I didn't feel like I would ever be able to do it, but consistency does seem to pay off.	That is awesome. I love working out. It's so great to be able to do it and see the results. I have been wanting to start working out more.
I have a feeling that the rest of this year is going to be great to me! I'm already working out and just have good vibes about the upcoming months.	That sounds great! What are you going to do?

I have but I've never really stuck to it. This time is different though, I've been going for a few months and feeling great about the future	I love that you've been working out for a while now. I have to do the same thing to feel good about the future.
My brother got a custom-made bowling ball, and ever since then he's been killing the game! It is awesome to see.	I love bowling, and I bet that's a really cool custom ball.  Did your brother buy it?

He's on his high school bowling team, but I think he mainly plays for fun. It's kind of cool seeing him get so much better over time.	It's really cool to see people improving over time, and it's good for them to have the opportunity to do so.

Ok, so the people upstairs were making a terrible noise last night and I'd had enough. I put jazz on quite loudly and went to bed. I really shouldn't have done that!	Yeah, I would not have done that either.

Well, they were shouting and stomping around, so I lost it! This morning, they've been quiet as church mice, so I guess it worked :)	Yeah, that is what I would do too. I would also consider putting earplugs in, I know it sounds silly, but some people can't sleep with ears plugged. I hope you get some good sleep tonight
Yeah, I really do feel bad, but it's been going on for over a year.	That's terrible.  Did they ever calm down and go away?  Or did you just have to move on?

Perhaps I'll try classical music next time - that might totally shut them up, lol.	That is funny.  I think you should try to relax a bit.  It's not like you're going to start singing and playing the piano.
I was watching my dad's house last week and I heard some odd noises while I was there alone.	I bet it was pretty spooky. What did you hear?
No kidding! Once I came back to the kitchen and the faucet was running even though I hadn't touched it.	Oh that's creepy. I would be so freaked out. Did you tell your dad about it?

I didn't see my parents since 2014! They live in a different country. I'm finally going to see them next week and I Just CAN'T wait!!	That's so exciting! I've never traveled abroad. What city are they in?
I know! And they've never met their grandson so they will be so excited to finally meet him	That is so cool. I wish you the best of luck.
I can't help but think back to the good old days at Christmas time.	Oh that was nice.  Did you go to church?

I'm sorry. That makes me really sad. We lived in a great neighborhood growing up and our neighbors were like family and always got together to celebrate.	That's a bummer. Christmas was always my favorite time of year.
The last time I went into a job interview, I knew as soon as I walked out that I would be getting a job offer. I felt I did really well.	Oh wow, that's great! Did you end up getting a job offer?
Definitely. You go through so many it's easy to feel down.	That's great! I hope you got the job!

Last winter I was out on my porch at 4 am. Suddenly a large figure dressed in black was walking towards me. My heart was beating like a drum!	I have never been in that kind of situation. How did you react?

I wasn't sure at first and, being in a wheelchair, had nowhere to go. Then the dark figure stopped in front of me. I thought I'd had it. Turns out it was my neighbor who couldn't sleep, walking her dog!	Oh my.

It is now. But it sure wasn't at the time. I was frantically looking around for something to beat my "attacker" off with!	I stress eat a lot. I decided i need to control it and i didn't eat sweets for more than a week. very proud of myself	I stress eat a lot too.  I had to get a gastric surgery a few years ago.
I'll try to do my best. i think i will also need to see a doctor. I just don't wanna get obese	That is good news, but also good that you are aware of your body and want to control it.
My co-worker just bought a brand new car.	I hate when people get a new car and they don't tell anyone about it. I would be so jealous!
I know, me too. I really envy them every day when I get in my beat up chevy that I've been driving for 10 years.	I bet you feel bad about yourself when you're driving your beat up Chevy. I mean it.
i wanna sell my phone so i posted ad on craigslist. i have 3 potential buyers but i'm so scared to meet them . you never know what people intentions are	i understand, i hope i get to meet a good one
I did but my husband was with me and now he is out of the country for a couple of months so  i will be alone	I understand. I'm a little jealous. But you will be safe.
I am moving into a new apartment in three weeks and can't wait. It'll be quiet as it looks onto a forest!	That sounds like a great move. What are the pros and cons of the move?
Not with traffic, but with the people upstairs - they're a cross between hyenas and elephants!. My new place was quiet when I was there, so fingers crossed!	Oh, I hope it is quiet!

They're the most selfish, inconsiderate neighbors I have ever had, and I've lived all over the world! I just cannot wait to get into this other place.	Someone stole my identity.	Oh that's a bad one.  How did they do that?
I don't know. They completely cleaned out my bank account and maxed out my credit cards. I am fuming.	I have never heard of that before. How do you deal with such a thing?
i have food on my table, a roof over my head and clothes to wear. I'm happy and thankful	That is very fortunate. I have never been in your shoes.

yes. Some people take these things for granted. it's really easy to take things and people for granted	I can relate. I'm always thinking about my parents, how they've been so generous and supportive. I feel so thankful to them.

so i decided to make a blanket and i got a sawing machine and got patterns and stuff. it tuned out to be so easy! I actually made 3 blankets	Oh, I'm so glad you did! I'm not exactly crafty like you, but I love to make things! I love sewing and embroidery!
thank you! I do want to take more and to give them to my friends who recently had babies	That sounds so fun!  I would love a new blanket.  Did your friends like them?
I remember being in Scotland and arranging a trip to California to see my then boyfriend. I was so very happy to be seeing him again!	Oh, what was the trip like?

Very hard and this was before the days of smartphones and FaceTime. We spent a fortune on telephone calls. But it was so worth it to speak to each other and I was lucky I could afford to fly out to see him.	I've been there, it's beautiful!  What was your favorite part of the trip?

Me too. That was one of the happiest trips of my life. The happiest was when we got married six months later!	When I spend time with my family, it reminds me how lucky I really am.	That's a great reason to appreciate your family.  How many family members do you have?

Definitely. Even when times get rough, there are still so many things to be thankful for. I did not always realize that, but glad I do now.	I know what you're talking about.
