I was a little nervous to eat some cloves of garlic for the first time	That was a bad idea!
I wasn't sure if it was going to make me sick or not	It was okay! I have eaten a lot of garlic and it never made me sick!
I accidentally left a book I borrowed from a friend outside	That is terrible! I would be worried if you had done that. Did you get in trouble?
I did but it was ruined from the rain.	I'm sorry that happened. I hope you can get it replaced or repaired.
I forgot to take some water bottles out from under my cart and pay for them at the store. I didn't realize I didn't pay for them till later.	I'm sorry. Did you find out about it later?
Hopefully I don't get bad karma for my accidental theft!	That happens to me too often, and sometimes I just forget I'm stealing!
I attended a ball recently, one of the girls had the most stunning dress.	I am sure she was the only one. What did she look like in the dress?

No way, her dress looked like little diamonds had been stitched on every inch of her dress. Not many girls can compete with that. Diamonds are forever.	I have never heard of anyone having diamonds stitched on their clothes. I have always thought they would have to be very special to do that.
I had to schedule an appointment with the dentist after not visiting one in five years.	It's a little intimidating when you haven't seen them for a while, but you'll be fine!
I do not have insurance. I went anyway because I had a problem with one tooth.	I'm sure it will be worth it, I would be a little embarrassed about it.
The internet has been there through thick and thin for me	Oh yeah. I've had to use my parents internet a lot lately. It can be pretty annoying.
True, it's a great resource to have	That's right! It's always there and always connected
Seeing animals sleep is very relaxing	That sounds like it would be a great way to relax. I'm a bit jealous.
I don't know, I guess I'm just tired	I think you're just tired of animals, that's all
My dog got hit by a car.	I'm sorry to hear that. I hope he is okay.
Yeah. He didn't survive. I really miss him	I'm sorry to hear that. I've had to lose two dogs. They're such a great companions and they bring so much joy.
I remember not having any responsibilities as a kid	That is a rare thing to see.  What were you responsible for?
Yea, those were the days	I remember it too. I was so happy to be free from responsibility.
I found an old photo album of my family. It really brought back memories.	I have a bunch of old photos too.
It's kind of a bittersweet experience	That's so nice! I bet it was fun to look through.
I had a tough semester but I just saw my grades and I'm pleased with the results.	Oh that's good news. What grades did you have?
Yeah, it was a huge relief for me. I am so glad to be done with this semester.	That's great, what did you end up getting in grades?
I should not have been so quick to let my teen take the car, but she was so excited.	It was a good thing she was excited though. She would have been too lazy to drive if it was up to her.
Well, let me just say that the pole made it out alright,lol.	That's a funny story. Did you have to pay for the damage?
She is, and now my car has a very crude imitation of a red racing stripe down the side!	After a gym workout I'm always ready to get back and hit a new PR	I love working out. It's great exercise!
I think just knowing that one day I'll be able to do things that are unimaginable right now, and I know I can do better the next time	I bet you feel good about that? I know the feeling!
My stomach made a loud noise while I was in class taking a test	That's terrible! Did you tell the professor?

I just pretended like nothing happened, but i'm worried everyone thinks it was something other than my stomach	Oh, that's a good one. What do you mean? Did you do something to your stomach or just make a weird sound?
I felt pretty good leaving the gym today, hit a new PR on overhead press	I love working out. I'm a big fan.
I like to try my hardest!	That sounds awesome! How much weight did you lift?
I felt like I could do anything after I finished meditating	That is awesome! Meditation has so many benefits!
I try to go longer everyday, I was able to go 50 minutes yesterday	That's amazing.  I'm a bit jealous, but I wish I could meditate.
I caught my boyfriend texting his ex	That must have been uncomfortable. What did you do?
I think he will dump me soon. He would rather be with her, I just know it	I would be mad at him too, why would he do such a thing?
My friend has been working with me on the weekends to get my tennis game on the next level.	That is really nice of them! I would do the same for them!
yeah I can consistently serve with power and accuracy now. I feel almost decent now.	That is really cool. You have to keep practicing.
A while back I caught my partner at the time being dishonest to me.	That is so rude!
We were together for a year and a half and we had a child together shortly before I found out!	That is horrible.  Did you have to divorce him?
High school was a great time, but those days are long gone	That's true, I used to go to high school and then go to college and then go back to work. It's a lot to go through.
No bills to pay, going out to eat with friends all the time, pretty fun	That sounds so fun! What school were you in?
Around 4 months ago, I had major surgery that caused me to be immobile for a few weeks.	I am sorry, what kind of surgery did they do?

Well, I had lots of support from my family, but I felt afraid of getting back into the swing of things for fear of failing. I felt so vulnerable.	I'm sorry to hear that, but you will get back into things, and you should!
I love going to the gym because I feel stronger	That is awesome, you must be very active.
Probably half a year, been the most consistent in my life, how about you?	Yeah, I'm not really good at it though.
It's tough to talk to my parents, but I try to talk about things we don't disagree on	I am sure that you can talk to them about it
Anything political or religious really, or relationships	Yeah, sometimes I have to be honest and tell them the truth. I don't think I would be honest with them if it was something I really wanted to.

I had my dog for 13 years before she passed away last year from cancer. It was devastating!	Oh my, I'm so sorry to hear that. I hope you were able to take care of her well enough for her to pass away peacefully.

Probably not for a while. She was a great companion, but I don't think my heart is ready to bring in a new dog quite yet.	That is so sad. I am sure you will find someone who will love her just as much as you did.
I was horribly wronged by someone I thought I could trust. The feeling was devastating, and I've always struggled with forgiveness.	I am sorry.
They were dishonest and physically cruel. We have gone our separate ways, but I truly hope they can learn to treat others better.	I am sorry to hear about that.
Last month I came home from work and noticed my cat wasn't feeling well, so I rushed her to the vet. I had to put her down.	It's so sad when we lose our pets.
I know, I just really miss her. Poor cancer kitty. I loved her so much.	Yeah, I've lost my cat a few times and I feel like I'm going to miss them so much.
MY roommate got a new cat last week, and we finally let them meet today. I was so nervous and worried about it.	That's awesome! I bet you felt bad letting them meet! How did they do?
It went okay. My cat bopped him a little and growled a lot but no real swipes. So better than expected I guess.	I bet. Cats can be a little feisty!
When I was pregnant with my first born, it was considered a high risk pregnancy. It made me very worried and anxious throughout.	That is a scary situation! Did everything turn out alright in the end?

I had to have emergency surgery in the end, but being able to hold my healthy baby was the greatest blessing I could have asked for.	That's so cool! Did you have to have any complications during the surgery?
I'm so happy summer classes are officially over and I'll be able to relax for a week!	It's been a long week. I'm glad it is finally over.

I'm not even sure what to do with all this time! I guess I should relax or have some leisure time, but everything in me says to try and be productive even on break. It's that school mentality.	It can be hard. But you can't let it go to waste.
My sister came to visit from out of state. It was the first time we've seen her in nearly a decade!	I bet that was a nice reunion!

Yes she lives on the other side of the country. We had a nice dinner, but my boyfriend is a loud chewer and a sloppy eater. It was quite embarrassing!	I bet it was. Did you have to remind her to be quiet?
I just bought a new dress and I can't wait to wear it this weekend.	That's so exciting! I love when you get something new! What kind of dress?
I'm going to wear it to a party. Everyone will have their eyes on me!	That sounds fun. What color is it?
A few months ago I could barely walk up a flight of stairs without having to catch my breath, but I bit the bullet and have been training.	Oh no, did you have to do it to get out of the house?

Wonderful! It's definitely hard work, but I continue on, even on the days I don't want to. Today I discovered I can now comfortably run an uphill mile and I feel very confident!	It's awesome that you are working towards your goal. Keep it up!
My boss told me about a potential job opportunity and I've been waiting to hear if it's going to happen	That sounds like a good opportunity!
A little bit. I am mostly excited about it though	That is awesome! I hope it works out for you!
I was very prepared for my final exam. It was so easy.	That's great! What was it for?
If I'm being honest, I made an answer key from the quizzes we took this semester. As they say, work smart, not hard.	That's good that you prepared well.
My cousin was swinging recklessly on my hammock and ended up breaking it!	It's a shame. I hope you guys get new hammocks soon.

I was very upset, especially considering how long it took me to get it set up. I loved laying in my peaceful hammock to read.	Yeah, it's like when you're trying to sleep and someone is banging on your door.
I received a phone call the other day from a friend I hadn't heard from in ages.	I love that kind of surprise, it makes you feel like a kid again.
We reminisced about old times. It was very nice, indeed. It was nice hearing from him, especially during some rough times!	That was nice. I'm glad you got to hear from him.
I have a weekend of nothing but relaxation planned for this weekend.	I love the weekend. What are you going to do?
I have some leftover roast in the fridge so I don't even have to leave the house. I'm going to watch a lot of netflix and MAYBE do a little laundry.	It's great to have a relaxing weekend.
I keep having these dreams that I am out in public and somehow my clothes disappear. It's awful.	That's a creepy dream. Did you ever find out what happened?

I hate those dreams, I feel anything but free. They're really uncomfortable and make me nothing but a ball of negative emotions like anxiety as I spend the majority of the dream trying to find clothes and get away from people.	I can relate, it is so frustrating.  I have a dream where I am at the grocery store and I just can't get anything.  I just want to get home and be free.
One of my friends recently bought a house. I really wish I could afford a house.	It's always nice to have a friend with your back. I'm not sure how you can afford one, though. That's a lot of money.

I'm starting to feel like I will never be able to afford a house. They're just so expensive. And the market has been going up here about 5% a year for the past 10 years.	Oh man, I feel you. I really do. I'm starting to feel like I'm stuck in some kind of financial limbo.
I ended up staying at home for the holidays	Oh, I know that happened with my family last year. It is so boring!

No all my family lives out of state. I didn't feel like traveling, but I just ended up sitting at home and watching lord of the rings in the dark.	That sounds like a pretty relaxing way to spend the holiday.
I bumped into a friend from middle school. We chatted for a while	Oh, nice. How did that happen?
Before 9th grade. I moved away that summer. Seeing her brought back a lot of good memories	It's always great to catch up with old friends
I had a doctors appointment at 9 am and they kept me waiting for almost 2 hours.	I would be mad too!
It was terrible I ended being late for work because of their horrible service.	That is so terrible. You must have been very frustrated!
The past few months have been terribly rough, but I think I can say that they have made me stronger.	That is great. What made the time worse?
Thank you. I hope that I can move forward and at least learn from these hardships.	I agree. I think we have to take the hard times in life to make us stronger.
I really hate when people can't hold themselves accountable for their own actions and decisions.	That's terrible. I'm not sure I understand what you mean.

Absolutely. Yet, these people have a horrible way of twisting things in order to guilt you, even if you'd done nothing wrong! It's a very manipulating and confusing feeling.	I can't help but feel that people are trying to manipulate others, especially when they do that.
I received a very odd message today. It came from a person who I blocked online, but they managed to find a loophole and messaged me by way of an inactive group.	Did you block the group as well?

They were just trying to find ways to contact me. I have literally blocked them on all social media. It seems borderline stalkish, and it makes me very anxious.	That's terrible. I would be worried about your safety.
I'm going rock climbing with some friends!	I love that sport! What are you climbing to?

I have done some climbing indoors for practice, but never done a big climb out doors, so who know how it will go.	I'm a climber too.  How many people are you going with?  I'm going to be doing a big climb out of the city this weekend.
I keep having these really weird nightmares at night.	That's really unsettling. Did you try to talk to a counselor about them?
I'm usually in a big city that I'm familiar with, and roam around in the dream until I get stalked, jumped, and sometimes very hurt.	That's really scary. What do you think is causing them?

Today I was quite impressed with my endurance during my work out. A few months ago, I couldn't even walk up a flight of stairs without losing my breath.	I'm not very good at exercise, but it's good for you. I hope you're not too sore tomorrow
I sure have, but it's such hard work. I make sure to work out, even on the days that I don't want to. It's definitely taken a lot of will power.	That's awesome! I wish you all the best.
I had a high risk pregnancy up until a few months ago. I felt the most grateful I'd ever been when my baby turned out healthy.	I'm happy for you.  What kind of baby is it?

It was a really rough pregnancy that ended with a very painful surgery. It was not pretty, but definitely worth it. I would have taken any amount of pain as long as my son was born healthy and safe.	That is great that your baby was healthy.

I just learned my first trick in ice skating, a triple spin twirl kick front flip.	That is awesome! I have never learned anything like that before. I am a beginner myself, but I am really excited for my upcoming birthday.
I never thought I would have the balance to perform such a feat. I think I can no qualify for the Olympics.	Oh that's cool! I've never been to the Olympics.

I just started college again, and while I'm doing great in school, it has lead me to feel very lonely with a lack of social life.	That's a bummer, but don't worry, you can always join clubs or organizations on campus!

That sound like a good idea if they weren't online classes. Next semester I have a few on campus courses, so I'm hoping I'll be able to make at least one new friend.	That's great that you have online classes. You might consider taking some of the online classes to meet new people.
This upcoming semester will be my first time taking 5 classes at once. I'm pretty worried that I may have taken on too much.	That's a lot of work! Are you sure you're ready for it?

I'm not sure. The more I think about it, the more I doubt myself. I also have a baby, so I'm hoping I'll be able to juggle everything at once.	That's awesome that you're having a baby, that's something to be proud of. I hope everything goes well for you.
I adore my girlfriend. I am getting very serious about not leaving her side.	That sounds nice, do you have kids together?
Thank you. Do you have a romantic interest?	I am in a relationship right now and I am not sure if I will be ever.
Summer in the South calls for many unwanted visitors of the insect type!	I know, it's so annoying when they show up unannously.
Mosquitoes, and those dreadful flying ants. They're everywhere!	Oh no! I hate them.  I have never been in a place where they haven't invaded.

Lately I've felt proud of my success as a newly single mother. It gets lonely sometimes, but I can honestly say I've been doing everything I can and more.	That's great. You're a very strong and independent woman.
Thank you! I definitely have a drive to feel strong for them. I hope some day they can realize my efforts.	I bet!  You're going to make them very proud.

I have a plethora of amazing friends. One of mine recently drove me from Georgia to South Florida	I'm jealous!  That sounds like fun.  Where did you go?  I've never been there.  What's the weather like?
It is an 8 hour drive! Florida is a very long state	I can relate to that. I am in Texas and it takes me about 3 hours to go to California. It's a big deal for me to drive that far.
I recently totaled my car. There were no injuries but I feel absolutely terrible	I hope it wasn't too expensive to fix.
It was very wet and I took a turn at too high of a speed.	That is terrible!
My mom and I haven't always had the best relationship. Recently I've had to tell myself to let her in more. It's been challenging.	Oh no, what happened?
Thank you. I know that, even though it's challenging, I need to be patient in order to improve our relationship.	Yeah, relationships are tough, but they are worth it. I'm happy for you.
I have had the toughest time getting my pet rat to get along with others. She's always been very aggressive!	Oh wow.  How old is she?

She's never bitten anyone, thankfully, but she gets crazy with other rats. To my surprise though, I've recently found her snuggling with the others she usually tries to fight!	That is awesome. I would be happy to see that. What type of rats are you talking about?
This past month, I was able to visit Six Flags!	That's awesome! What did you do at the park?
It was amazing. The last time I was at an amusement park had to have been over a decade ago!	That's awesome!  What was your favorite ride?
The other day I noticed my pet has a growth on her lower belly. I fear it may be a tumor.	That's scary. Is it something you know about?
She's a rat, so her body is very frail. I'm sad that she likely will not make it. She's been with me through thick and thin.	It's a terrible disease, but I hope she has a good time.
I let the girl of my dreams slip away. Now I am alone.	I am sorry to hear that. What happened?
I hope so. I think that time heals all wounds.	I feel you. I let someone go too. I was so happy with her, but then she moved on. It's a tough thing to do.
I recently went to the pool and lost my suit. My trunks were in the water without me!	That's pretty awful, were you in a rush to get back in?
I was not, unfortunately. People saw everything!	That sucks! I would have felt like I had done something wrong.
I let a romantic interest slip through my fingers. She's now with somebody that I despise	I am sorry that happened. What did you do about it?
I think so. I have plenty of time and life goes	Oh no! I'm so sorry! That's terrible.
I feel great right now. I have a new album coming out and it feels liberating to be done!	That is so awesome! I love your enthusiasm!
I am very excited. It is almost an hour and a half long	That's awesome, are you going to tour?
I can't wait to travel. I am going to Madagascar soon!	That's awesome. I have been to Madagascar once.
I have! I actually grew up in Saudi Arabia	That's so cool! I have always wanted to visit Madagascar. How was your trip?
The world is savage. I believe that the right individuals can take us to a better place in the future	That's a great point, I'm sure it will be a better world if more people work towards it
I think so too. There are some kind and great people in the world	That is true.  I believe we have a chance for better.  We just have to work towards that goal
I went walking in the woods one night. It was pretty scary out there	That is so true. I once went to the woods and I saw a raccoon.
No, everything was fine, but it was a chilling experience	Yeah I have gone on many a scary hike and walk, and I always try to keep a level head.
I caught my dog trying to eat my nephew's dirty diaper that my brother left on the couch	That's disgusting! I wouldn't let my dog do that. Did you throw it away?
It was really gross. I had to keep my dog from licking my face for a long time after that.	I can understand that. I would be pretty mad at my dog if he did that.
I recently remembered a sweet memory of my aunt who recently passed away.	That's really sad. What happened?
She would give hundreds of dollars of school supplies to kids in need each year.	That's very nice of her. It's great when people like that still exist.

She did! I fill stockings around the holidays and go around on Christmas giving them out to people who have to work. :)	That's really kind of you. I have to do that for my kids. It's a lot easier when they're little, but now that they're older, they don't care.
My daughter and her family are coming this Thanksgiving. I'm already preparing for their visit.	Oh no, I bet that is going to be a fun trip.
Not too much, just really exciting. I'm planning everything even though it's months away, even the menu.	I can't wait for the kids to come visit! I hope you have a great time!
My mother in law was recently placed in hospice and is not expected to live much longer.	That's terrible. I'm so sorry. I'm so sorry to hear that.

She's 87, so she has lived a long life, but she has Alzheimers, and it's really sad to watch her lose her mind.	I hope she has a good life and is at peace.  I know that is hard to see, especially for those who love her.

That's a great way of looking at it. I should try to keep a positive attitude towards it.	That's very compassionate of you, to try to keep a positive attitude towards it. I hope you can find a way to help her out as much as you can.
I was driving home from out of town really late one night and was exhausted	I bet you were so tired you didn't even drive

I did get home safe but it was scary because the roads were two lane and lots of 18-wheelers were heading in the opposite direction. I kept thinking I would swerve into their lane and collide into them	I can imagine. Did you get a good night's sleep?
I've been trying to be extra supportive towards my husband.	I bet.  I bet you are the best husband you've ever been.
Yes - so true. His mom is dying, and he is working long hours on top of it. I feel really bad for him.	That is really nice. I hope he feels better soon.
My friend who I haven't seen in a long time came to visit. She married a very wealthy man and I was a bit envious	Oh that is a lot different from when you were friends. I can understand the feeling.

She drove up in a fancy car and seems like she doesn't have a care in the world. I wish that were me some days.	I'm sorry, I was trying to be funny.  I know that feeling.  It's hard to be happy when you're struggling with money.  But I wish you the best of luck and I'm glad you're able to see the world.
I was at a get together recently and a friend's husband was flirting with me.	That sounds kind of weird.
I didn't know what to say to her, and was afraid she wouldn't believe me and it would cause her to be angry at me. It's a bad situation.	I would have been in a similar situation.
When I was in second grade, I wet my pants in the middle of class.	That must have been very embarrassing. What happened next?
I know! I was super afraid of my teacher, and was scared to ask her to go to the bathroom.	I know! I had to go to the bathroom and get a towel to wipe up the mess.

She was really mean and always yelling! I didn't want her to yell at me. I'm much older and wiser now!	I want to trick my butler into thinking he won the lottery. I've taped the local new's winning lottery numbers and I'm going to buy a ticket with the same numbers and give it to my butler	What is the odds of winning?
I'm not sure he likes being the target of pranks, but he likes to prank me and this prank is to get back at him for a prank he pulled on me and my cousin	I love when people do that.
My friend just took her kids to Disneyland and I feel a little bad about it.	That's cool! I have a friend with kids.
I'd been wanting to do that trip with my kids for years. I'm happy for her- just wish it could have been me.	I understand that. But you could have been there.
I won a trip to Washington D.C. a few years ago	That is awesome. What did you do in Washington D.C.
I had a blast. I met people from all over the country, visited many historical sites, and learned a lot about how government works	I would love to visit Washington D.C.
I'm looking forward to my best friend's surprise birthday party next week!	Oh yeah! I love surprise parties. What's the surprise?
I'm really happy about it- she's a great friend and she's turning 40, so it's a big one!	Yeah, I bet it'll be great!
About 20 friends, surprising her at her favorite bar after work.	My 25th high school reunion is coming up and I'm excited.	Oh that is nice.  What are you looking forward to?
Honestly? There was this girl who really treated me poorly - I can't wait for her to see how successful I have been!	Oh man! That's awesome! What did she do?
A hurricane hit my city. The first night I thought the wind was going to tear the roof off the house	Oh no!  I hope you were okay!  What happened?
It was my third. Luckily we didn't lose power for more than a few hours	That is terrible.  I hate when hurricanes come through.
It damaged the roof and the fence. We lost power for six days during the first hurricane I experienced	I'm glad that didn't happen to you.  What hurricane did you experience?
I am loyal to my principles, that is why I do not eat meat, because I love life	That is good. I love my wife, but I eat a lot of meat.
If I already have 10 years of vegetarian	That is great! I like vegetarian food too.
I healthy physically and spiritually	My daughter recently broke curfew by three hours!	I am so proud of her!
I was super angry, yes! I ended up grounding her for three weeks- one week for each hour she was late.	I hope she learns from it.  What is she going to do next time?
I have a certification exam coming up and I think I'll do well.	That's good to hear! What's it for?
I think so- I've studied quite a bit with my husband and others.	It's great that you are prepared. I hope you do well on your exam!
Education- teaching license certification	Hello ... I confess that when I see my daughter's eyes, my heart suffers.	Oh, that's a very sweet thing.
They are sick	I am sorry to hear that. What is wrong with her?
Relax, they are things that happen	My new manager gave me a pay-rise!	That's great! What kind of pay rise?
I feel very grateful that he has been so generous.	That is awesome!  What kind of pay-rise?
My partner left me the other day.	Oh no. I'm so sorry.
That's fine, its not your problem. i just feel very lonely right now.	I feel you, I was in a similar situation recently.
I just moved to a new city and I don't know anyone	That's a bummer. But it's a great opportunity for growth and meeting new people. What's the new city?
Yeah, it's hard though. I hate to go out by myself. It's hard for me to meet new people	I am sure you will meet people.
I took my final exams a few weeks ago and I was sure I had done well, but I failed.	That is bad! What happened?
I don't know what happened. I studied and passed everything else. Now I have to retake the class and I'm upset	That's terrible. Are you going to retake the class?
My sister kept playing a few seconds of a song over and over again on her laptop last night. Now it's stuck in my head.	That is annoying, I bet. Did you tell your sister about it?
It drives me bonkers when she does that	Yeah, that is the worst part about being in a relationship. She does this all the time and I am the only one who doesn't seem to care.
I saw these 4-color Bic pens in the store the other day. I remember when I was young and getting one was like Christmas morning!	Oh my god, I love those pens!

Yes! My mom used to always get me one each year before school started. Those were the coolest pens in the world!	I'm glad you liked the memory, it is a good one. I'm sure you'll be getting a pen soon. I've been getting new ones for a long time.
I'm optimistic that my house is going to sell soon.	That's good news! I've had to sell my house a few times.
Only a week- and 17 people have seen it already, so I'm feeling good about it selling quickly!	That is good to hear!  Are you selling it to someone or to a family?

My best friend was going to travel from Wisconsin to see my this summer, but she ended up not being able to come.	That sucks!  I'm sure she was really looking forward to it!  Did you find someone else to take her place?

Nothing- I still haven't seen her. I felt pretty let down - but hopefully I can make the trip to see her soon.	I understand your feelings.  I'm sure you will be fine.  You can't be disappointed.  She will come back when she is ready.  She will come back when she is ready.  She will come back when she needs to come back.
My sister threw up the other day and made a huge mess.	That's no good.  Is she okay now?
Fortunately no- she cleaned it up. But she had just had spaghetti and it was floating in it. It was so gross!	That's disgusting. I hope she felt bad about what she did.
I was livid when I went to work the other day and saw my car was broken in to	That's terrible. I hate when someone breaks into your car!
I heard it was happening in other areas but didn't expect it here because we live in a nice neighborhood. So frustrating	I hate when that happens.  Did you call the police?
Every year when the kids go back to school, it brings back so many memories of when my kids were going to school.	That's a bummer. I'm sure it brings up some memories of your kids.

I would cry the first day of school every year, especially the milestone years. Now my grandchildren are starting school. Time flies by too quickly	I know what you mean. I have 2 grand kids and they're both going to be in the same class this year. I have a hard time remembering things.
So everyone is gone form the house and i found a thing of thin mints, and I ate the whole thing for breakfast.	That's so awesome. What did you eat?

Those examples are definitely the simple pleasures of life. It makes me want to go outside and listen to the birds and smell the flowers.	I'm the same way. I've always been a simple person.

Yes, it was not fun, but good to know I am not the only one.	I enjoy helping the wildlife in my area where I live. I give them a helping hand. I give them water, birdseed, my left over food. Its a long hair chihuahua and a short hair chihuahua. He has the most adorable under bite!	It is so cute.  I love puppies.

I'm learning to live my live without her, it's tough. Some honesty would have made the way it ended much better. Thanks for the kind words.	It's okay.  I know you are trying to move forward.  You will be okay.  I am sure it will be okay.  It will get better.  You will find someone else to love you.  Don't give up.  You will find your way again.  It will be okay.

I went on a soda fast for two days so that I could pray for strength for my husband while he tried to quit smoking. I am addicted to soda so it was hard. No, they suck!!	I recently had an argument with a friend. Even though I talked ot her about it and let her know how I felt, my daughter overheard me discussing it with my husband. I did, i played a few sessions of age of empires and i plan to play some command and conquer red alert tonight before bed, still great games.	I have played some of those games too, they were a lot of fun.

Thanks.  But yes, I was really dejected.  I thought I'd interviewed well and had a good enough resume.	Yeah, sometimes you can't do what you want because of what you have.

When my wife left me, i felt worthless and like giving up on life to be honest, I've since started making some positive changes and and more optimistic	That is a good thing, how did you change your life?

Well, Like the saying goes, get busy living or get busy dying. I'm not sure if i'll ever find someone i truly love but life goes on!	I know right, I feel you.  I hope you find what you're looking for and find happiness in the end.

It cost me around $30,000. It has all the latest features, that should keep me safe in all but the most extreme conditions.	That's awesome! I'm glad to hear that. What lake?

Yeah, I meant don't like, sorry. I recently lent some to my friend with no expectation of getting it back because of her hard situation. I actually got it back.	Yeah, I can understand that. It is not fair to expect people to do good things for you, but at the same time, it can be good for them to get the chance to prove themselves

I know! I feel both violated and kind of sad because I have nothing in my car worth stealing.	Yeah, that's the worst.  They probably didn't mean to cause any damage or take anything.  But still, they shouldn't have done it.

There was an elderly lady at my church who was blind and could not hear well so you had to talk really loud for her to hear you. She was very faithful about coming to church so our preacher picked her up and took her home for every service. When she needed help, we took turns helping her.	That is really kind.  What a good woman.

Oh wow, that is a very kind thing to do. I would do something similar for a family member or friend. It's always nice to help out those who are less able.

Yes, she loved everyone she met. She would say she couldn't remember everyone's names, but she loved them anyway.	I took my son to kindergarten the other day. He loves it so far!	It is great that you are letting him experience new things.

Lately, my family and I have been very blessed. We are all happy and healthy. We have just been trusting in the Lord.	That is great, you must feel very happy and relieved.
Thank you.	I was looking at some old pictures of my kids' first day of school from 4 years ago.	That's nice. I'm a big kid, but I used to be a little shy and didn't like crowds.

I think I aced my supervisor exam!	It is good to see you got it right

I did not. I left there quickly. It was not something I would ever want to do.	I would never cheat on my wife either.

I love cats, I have one of my own. I haven't been around a kitten in forever so it's a real treat. I also don't have to sleep with the little brat at night either so it's especially great.	Oh wow! That's so nice of you! I hope the little one is well taken care of.

I had a solo competition last week for cello. I was well prepared and knew my music well. I felt great walking into that room.	It sounds like everything was going well until you went out to practice and had a disaster.
I have been playing the cello for 5 years.	That sounds like a lot of practice!
I slipped and feel at work the other day. Several people saw it. I wanted to just crawl in a hole and hide afterwards.	That's terrible! I'm sorry to hear that! Did you get hurt?
Just my pride	I'm sorry you had that happen. I hope you didn't get in trouble for it.

He claims that he kept getting raises and felt obligated to work even harder. So he just kept working more and more and I rarely got to spend time with him and he was always tired.	Oh my. That is horrible. I hope he is okay.

The straw that broke the camels back is that he broke a promise that he would leave his job if they were over working him too much. It's like you are stuck in limbo because you don't know what to do.

5	I can relate. My sister has two kids and she is an amazing mother.

I don't know, that's what I would like to know! The best I can imagine is that the water quality dropped, and they died. I imagine it was pollution.	That is terrible! I hope they were not toxic.

I have a really big game coming up this weekend. I haven't played soccer since I was a kid and have been really nervous about joining an adult league.	That's a lot of pressure. Do you have any experience?

Last year I made a bet with my friend and he lost, so he had to buy me a Nintendo Switch. I was so great.	That's so cool! What was your friend so bad about?

I made a bet that he would not lose 20 pounds in 3.5 months. I was hoping that he would win the bet, but on the bright side I got a switch :) Win-win for me.	I am glad you got a Nintendo Switch.  That is a lot of fun stuff to do!
I am visiting my friend this week.	It's always nice to see friends. What are your plans for the weekend?
Yes, I mean I promised her I would  and some things came up but I know I gotta stick to my word and make this happen.	I bet you will!

Oh I know I can't. She had lots of plans for us.	One time when I was little and playing hide and go seek, my cousin talked me into remaining hidden even when our parents came looking for us. Yeah, my cousin was definitely a bad influence. He was a bit of a bully and a jerk, and he would often get into fights with other kids.

So we are moving and I'm having trouble letting go of a sewing machine my grandma gave me. Thinking I should keep it.	I understand why you would want to keep it, but I think it's time to let go and move on.
Kind of just dust. It meant a lot to her that I have it so I just don't think I can let it go.	It is nice that you are keeping the thing that your grandma gave you.

Yeah I know, I'm really amazed and proud of him. To be honest as proud as I am I can't help but to be a little jealous too lol.	I can understand that feeling, but at the end of the day, it's all about the money, and you're right, you're probably not that far from that milestone yet. Just time to start saving and working hard for that.

My husband and I celebrated 9 years Saturday. It was such a good day of quality family time.	That is awesome.  What did you do?

Yes I love a good day of relaxation and family time :)	That is great!  I am sure you two have a lot of great memories to look back on.  I am so glad you have such a loving husband.  I wish I had someone like him to love me back!  I think I need to work on my self-worth.  I am so grateful for my family, I am sure I would be lost without them!  I love my family!  I am so grateful for my family!

Yes, dinner :)	I went to the zoo last month, I haven't been since I was a kid. I went to a zoo that was supposed to be one of the top zoos, however I couldn't help but feel bad for the animals the whole time.	I'm sorry to hear that! I hope they are doing okay!

The enclosures all just seemed so tiny and it felt like none of the animals were able to have any privacy if they wanted it.	It's always good to think about how the animals are living their lives. Statistics. I am going to help a real estate company build models to predict house values	I hope you get it, I've been out of the job market for a long time.
So a friend and I entered a drawing at the mall and she won. I wish I could say it doesn't sting a bit that she won.	That is unfortunate.  Did she have to go to a different store?
A weekend trip to Gatlinburg. I would of loved that.	I am sorry to hear that.
She is but she's taking her husband :)	I saw  man swallow a sword	i saw a guy do that in a bar last year. it was pretty scary

Moving, not sure when yet but I like to be  ahead of the game. I hate being rushed.	I know how that feels.  I hope your moving soon.

Huge dent, I can't believe someone could do that and drive off.	That sucks!  Did you report them?

Oh man, I sure was. And she was so excited to get out of that box.	I remember when I got my first dog.  I was so excited to have her, and she was the most loyal companion ever
My brother isn't very good with money but i just lent him some	That's a good brother.  I don't think he would have been very good with money even without you lending him money.

I just can't believe some people. I watched this woman throw her trash on a homeless man today.	Oh my gosh. That's terrible. Did she get in trouble for that?
I definitely stepped in and made sure this man knew he didn't deserve that. Just makes me so mad to share a country with people like that.	That's terrible.  I hope you get to the bottom of this.
So we are waiting on some news to move. I feel like it will be this week that we find out.	That's exciting. I hope everything goes smoothly.
Not sure yet, waiting to find all of that out. I hate waiting though.	That's frustrating.  Are you planning to move this weekend?

I hope you find some comfort in the memories of the time you spent with your pet.  I hope you find some comfort in the memories

okay.	I am happy for you
