My daughter tripped on the cord and it smashed on the ground, not sure if it can be saved. I was pretty angry.	It is very unfortunate that it happened.  It can be frustrating when it happens.
I woke up the other morning, got ready and drove all the way to work. Just to find out it was a holiday and we had the day off.	That sucks. I'm sorry. Did you go to church?
I know, but the extra day of work was nice. Especially since I wasn't expecting it.	That is nice. I wish I had that day off.
It was wonderful. I ended up being twice as productive since I got up early.	That sounds good! I'm glad you got a bonus! What kind was it?
My new job is starting tomorrow. I'm feeling nervous, but really optimistic about it.	Yeah that must be a lot of nervousness.
It's a job they opened up for graphic design! I'm super excited to get started and learn more from them.	That's great news! I hope it goes well!
Going to my son's first pee-wee football game tomorrow!	That sounds fun! What position does he have?

He thinks he does.  All I can think of is a bunch of Tiny Titans in helmets running around like chicks in a barnyard.  *chuckle*	Oh, that's great! My son is in the 5th grade and he's never been to a game.
I put in a job application for a new job. I am fairly certain that my credentials are enough to get me the job.	I hope you get it!
I was, I go in next Tuesday. I am pretty excited for them to give me the job.	I bet you are.
Me too, we shall see. Now the waiting begins!	I got a call about job with a good company that is in my line of work.	I'm sorry to hear that.  That's a great opportunity.  Did you get the job?
No, but I have the necessary experience, and I'm optimistic that it will work out.	Oh, nice. You must be excited!
I went to the petstore with my dog and he had an accident in front of everyone. He had the saddest look on his face.	Oh no! That is terrible! Did he get a bath?
He did, the clerk walked over, told him it was ok and gave him a treat.	That must have been very scary for the pet store clerk to deal with. Did you see the clerk's face change?
I had a video job interview. That was a new experience.	That must have been nerve wracking!
I'm not sure. It was a little awkward and stressful.	It was okay, I hope you did good. I hope you got the job
Sure, that's ok. And thank you.	That is a good way to put it. I think I would have been a little upset.

I've been diagnosed with psoriatic arthritis and the pain is horrible. The problem is that the medicine that my doctor wants me to take has side effects worse that the pain.	That is awful.  Are you looking into anything else?
Maybe, I haven't been back because I can't afford to go right now. I've just been dealing with the pain.	Oh no, I hope you are able to get some more treatment.
It suck.Hopefully we can both get coverage soon.	My son got picked to be on the soccer team that he was on last year!	I am happy for him.  I am not sure about you.
He is!  Especially since last year's team won the Opening Day Tournament and then won the Regular Season title!	That's awesome, I bet he's excited!

Yeah!  We had a group of really talented kids, and some very good [and patient] coahes!	The other day, my three year old didn't know I was paying attention to her while she was playing with the dog. I overheard her trying to teach the dog how to count to ten.	I'm sorry that happened.  How old is she?

Yes, I thought that was pretty good for a three year old. When I asked her about it she said they were playing school. Haha.	That's hilarious.  She is such a smart one.  She can do all sorts of math and read.
I'm very proud of her.	I am too, she is such a smart and creative one.

I babysat and worked odd jobs all summer when i was younger to save up and buy a sega dreamcast.	That was a great time, I used to play that all the time. I had to go to work to pay bills, but I loved it.
Yep, i've never looked forward to something so much in my life. I still have the dreamcast as well.	I bet you were a good babysitter.
I'm gonna need your support here, because I'm going through something a little bit rough, okay?	That is a terrible thing to do.  What is going on?
I'm 29 years old and I woke up to find that I'd wet the bed last night. I'm...not even sure how. I didn't drink a whole lot before bed or anything.	I don't like it when I wake up to a wet bed.
Should I see a therapist or anything? Is this indicative of some deep-seated problem that I'm not aware of?	It's not a problem. You just need to go to the bathroom.
My Uncle Jebodiah is always looking out for me. He recently told me that he had a special concoction that if I drank it, it would cure my herpes.	Did you drink the concoction?

Listen, my Uncle Jeb wouldn't do me dirty like that. You may call it """snake oil""" but I call it the miracle cure this world needs. After all, it worked.	I can't believe you have a uncle that is that kind of person.
My cat was kept overnight at the vets recently. I was so worried!	Oh, that's not good. Did it come home?
She's fine now! They found out it was something minor after x-rays. I was so relieved.	That is so good to hear!  What was the minor problem?
My car broke down on a busy highway the other day. There were so many cars zooming past me, it was scary!	That is terrible. Did you get a good deal on the car?
My brother had to pick me up. He had to pull up behind me on the curb. It felt dangerous!	That sounds so scary. I'm glad you are okay.

Look, can we just be honest with each other for a second? Having ebola shouldn't mean that I have to be grounded and miss out on my chance to walk on the moon during the upcoming lunar missions.	That is not a reason to be grounded.

I saw one, and he said if I gave him $25,000 he would clear me for flight, but I don't have that kind of money just lying around. It's a real bummer. Now I just have to do super boring NASA desk work like tracking comets. Lame.	I can't even imagine having to deal with that.
I am obsessive about being ready for anything	That sounds like you're a bit anxious. What makes you so anxious?
I don't know.  I just see stuff in the grocery store and think I like that food and buy it because it is on sale.  Even if I already have it!	That is so cool!  You must have a lot of money!
My girlfriend's leg was bitten off by a bull shark last summer.	Oh no! That's really scary! I've never been near the water in my life.

She's fine now. I spent a month in the hospital with her, then was with her every day for three months while she was in rehab. She was out spreading sacrificial lamb's blood in the water on a fishing trip. Gotta love her.	My girlfriend's leg was bitten off by a bull shark last summer. She's fine now. I spent a month in the hospital with her, then was with her every day for three months while she was in rehab. She was out spreading sacrificial lamb's blood in the water on a fishing trip. Gotta love her.<|eot_id|>

It was swallowed whole, unfortunately. I just hope the shark seasoned it properly. I won't stand for underprepared human thigh meat. Gordon Ramsay wouldn't have it, and neither will I.	I forgot about plans that I had made with my mother over the weekend.	Yeah, what happened?
I called her right up and we rescheduled! I felt so bad though.	Oh no.  What plans did you forget about?
I was talking to a British friend of mine and trying to explain why our president feels compelled to tweet	That is very interesting. What does he tweet about?
They think someone needs to take his phone away	That's so annoying! What is wrong with people in this age of social media?
I was looking through the attic and found a box of childhood toys. They brought back so many memories!	Oh that must have brought a lot of back memories! What did they do?
It was nice to find them all and think back to those simpler times	Oh, that sounds great. I have a lot of old stuff that I found too!
The last trip I took to Chicago was by plane.	It's so cool to see how much different the city is in person.

I had! I love chicago.  The flight is nice and short too, though I wasn't feeling well.	I love Chicago!  I went there last week.  I was there for a week.  I think I had a great time.  I think you should go there.  It's a really nice city.

I think my electrolytes were off, I actually fainted on the plane and they made a whole to-do about it.	My university is posting live stream of students moving in and I was reminiscing about when I studied abroad in college	I am sorry I missed out on that. What were you studying?
I studied in Venice Italy and travelled all over Europe	I love traveling. I've always wanted to visit Europe.

I won a storage shed auction last Monday and found my grandmother's old glass eye in a steamer trunk inside of the shed. Really reminded me of her and how much I miss her.	Oh that's nice.  Did you find a good price for it?

Rita May. She used to mess with me by popping it out and showing me her empty eye socket just to get a laugh while she got drunk off of bourbon. Those were such good times.	Yeah, it was a lot of fun, but now she's gone and I miss her so much. I wish I could see her again.
I'm pretty excited for the upcoming Halloween season.	That is awesome. I love Halloween! What are you planning?

Well In September, Universal Studios starts their Halloween Horror Nights events, after dark!  It's so much fun I can't wait to grab tickets.	That's so cool. I've never been to any of the Universal Studios locations. I hope I get to go next year!
I was loyal to the same company for 10 years.	Oh no.  What happened?
Nice. I wasn't rewarded though. They laid me off.	Oh, I'm sorry.  How are you coping?
I told a lie to my mother.	I'm sorry.  What was it?
I was about school. And I eventually confessed.	That's a tough situation. Did she believe you?
I got a job after a long period of unemployment.	That's great, I hope you can keep it up!
Yes. I was very happy to be gainfully employed.	That's great! You must feel happy and relieved!
I was in a car accident. Both cars were totaled.	I'm sorry to hear that. I hope you're doing alright.
They were running from the police. It was nerve rattling.	I bet that was scary!  What happened?
So my family surprised me this year with a party for my birthday.	I'm glad you had a great time!  What did they do?
They got me the new shoes I've been wanting. I was so elated and had such a good time!	I'm glad you were able to celebrate your special day with family.
I had a job interview. The guy really knew his stuff.	That sounds awesome. What did he do?
Yes, really smart and easy to talk to.	That is great! You must be excited.
I don't know yet.	Our power went off the other night. We were without it until morning!	Oh wow! I hope you were able to get it back.
Someone crashed into the power line I think. It was so quiet and felt pretty spooky.	That sounds scary! I hope you were safe!
I bought a raffle ticket for a charity where I have a 1/500 chance of winning a car	That is nice. I hope you win!
Yes.  They were $100 but they only sell 500 tickets.  And the money raised goes to breast cancer research	That's nice. I don't have any money to buy raffle tickets.
jumpfortherose.com	Someone helped me move.	That is so nice of them, I am sure they were happy to help.
Yes, and I paid them with beer. I was thankful because I had a toe injury.	That sounds like a good time. Did you have to do the moving yourself?
I bought a powerball ticket last week but did not win	I know, it's always disappointing, but you have to keep trying.
I would have bought a new car and a house perhaps.  But I lost :-(	I am sorry to hear that, but I am sure you will win soon! You never win on powerball!
Yes.  Maybe next time I will win!	I spent Saturday night playing Lord of the Rings Online.	That is a great game.  I have been playing it for months now and I am addicted.
It is good, but I sometimes wonder if I'm trading real life for a fantasy world.	I have played that game before. I was also wondering that.
I am so mad that our politicians won't do something to stop Russian hacking	That is terrible. I am so angry about that.

Yes.  The Republicans just don't seem to care about our country any more and I am so mad that Putin owns Trump	That's really sad.  I don't know how you feel.  But I think that they should try to stop Russian hacking.
My goldfish died.	It happens to the best of us. I'm sure he was a great fish.
For 4 years. I'm bummed.	Yeah I've had my fish die too. It's always a sad day when that happens
Not yet.	I had an unprofessional job interview.	I know how that feels.  What happened?
The receptionist ignored me, and my interviewer was not prepared.	That sucks! What happened?
My computer crashed while I was working on a project.	Oh, that is bad. What happened?
I did. I hadn't saved, and I forgot to set up autosave. It was very frustrating.	That is so frustrating. What did you do?
My favorite team blew a big lead in the playoffs. It was like drinking sour milk.	That's awful. I can't believe that happened.
I hate when teams choke. It makes me sick.	That's terrible.  What team is it?
I woke up this morning and my eye is itchy and my right eyelid is drooping	I hope you can get it under control.  Is it a cold?
yeah I am going to see what it seems like tomorrow - not sure if something got in it that scratched it or what	That is terrible.  Is it going to be okay?
Yeah I will if it does not get better quickly	Me and my family went to see a magic show for the first time today.	That's really cool. I've never seen anything like that. What kind of show was it?
I didn't catch his name, but he pulled a rabbit out of his hat. Classic trick, but I'll never forget it!	I love magic!
I have a job interview tomorrow. I'm looking forward to it.	I'm sure you will do great! What is the job?
Yes. It seems like a great opportunity.	Oh, you're excited about it! That's good!  What kind of job is it?
I scored well on an aptitude test.	That's awesome! Did you feel confident about the results?
I had a few drinks. I felt good.	That's cool! How did you do?
So today my mother brought over a whole week of meals to help me out.	That's really nice of her. How did you like the food?

Yes, she's always helping me out! I am so thankful for her she's an amazing mother.	That's nice of her. I have a similar mother too. She always comes over and brings food, and she's also super helpful.  I wish she had kids of her own.  She's a very nice lady.

So I moved away from my parents not too long ago. It's been a big change.	I am sure it is.  I moved away from my parents a few years back.  It was very scary and lonely at the time, but I think it was good for me in the end.
Out of state. I'm by myself now, so it's pretty quiet! I miss them a lot.	That is sad. How old are you?

My oldest child needed braces but her health insurance wouldn't cover the expense. It was close to 4000 dollars and we did not have that kind of money at the time.	That's horrible. Did she get the treatment she needs though?  I have heard that is a big part of the deal when you're trying to get the insurance to cover something.
Yes they do. My aunt paid half of the cost for us and didn't has for any of it back because she knew we needed the help.	That must've been really tough. I'm glad your aunt was able to help.
I was sitting on the couch after a long day taking care of work and all the mommy stuff the other day.	I bet you were exhausted! How old are the kids?
It was! My family was happy and together. Chatting and watching tv. Everything just felt right.	Oh, that's wonderful! That's always nice to have that kind of time with the family
My husband used to work out of town in a different state Sunday through Thursday.	That is a long time. How did you manage to keep it that long?

Yeah, he does work hard. Even thought my children were with me and we kept our usual routines, I was miserable when he was gone. I would cry after he left every Sunday. Luckily now, he has a job where he is home everyday by supper time.	That's great! I wish he would come back more often.

We really are, he brings out the best in me.	I didn't have a car to get to and from work, so my parents actually let me just keep theirs for a bit!	That's really generous of them.  I don't have a family to speak of, so I wouldn't have done anything like that.
Yeah it was so giving of them to leave it to me for so long and helped me a ton!	That was so nice of them, I'm sure they were happy that it was their car.
While driving today I went past my grandma's old house. She passed last year.	It's nice that you went back there to pay your respects.

Oh for sure. Good feelings, but I also miss her so much.	It's okay to feel sad about the loss, but I know that she is in a better place. I hope you are able to find happiness and peace in your future.
I went outside to get my paper this morning. Someone had ran over my mailbox!	That is a terrible thing to see.  I would have been mad.  Did they steal it?
No, it's completely demolished! I'm feeling pretty annoyed.	Yeah that sucks! What are you gonna do?
My sister is a journalist and she got her first big story published in the paper today!	That is so cool. What is your sister working on?
It is! It's a really big deal and I couldn't be happier for her.	It is! It's a really big deal and I couldn't be happier for her
So my partner gave me the biggest surprise this week.	Oh that's great. What was it?
He got us a trip to Hawaii! I couldn't believe it, I am so elated!	That's so cool. I've never been to Hawaii.

I finally went and adopted a cat last month and go way more than I expected!	That sounds great!  I am not a cat person, but I love dogs.  I have never even been around cats.  I know they can be a bit more challenging to take care of, but I have heard good things about them.  I think I would be okay, but it would be a lot of work.  I would have to do a lot of research to learn all the right things.  I am sure it was a bit overwhelming.
Well it was only supposed to be her, but we found out she was pregnant! She popped out a whole litter of adorable.	Yeah, that must be a lot of fun!
I had to leave town last week and that meant leaving my pets who are my babies. I needed someone who could take care of them properly.	That is terrible, how did they do?
It is very hard! The only one who I'd let do it was my sister and she did an amazing job.	That's good, I hope you can get them back soon.
So I finally decided to take my dog for his first dog park visit.	Oh, I'm glad you were able to take your dog.
It's hard to tell! He refused to leave my side the entire time and just watched the other dogs play.	i bet you were a little nervous for your dog.
Im embarrassed to admit I forgot to pick up my brother from worth the other day after agreeing to	I know how that feels.  What did you do?  Do you know how he felt?

Ha ha, he was a little miffed. He got over it though when I stopped and got him ice cream on the way back though! I felt like such a jerk.	That's a pretty good excuse for being a jerk. I'm sure you're a good brother in the end.
I finally took the plunge and decided to go back to school this year.	I know you mean to go back to college.
I start next week! I was super hesitant at first, but I'm so glad I'm making myself do it.	I'm glad you are.  What is it that you want to study?
I was going through some stuff and found a box of jewelry my grandparents had gifted me through the years.	That must have been very emotional for you.  Did you keep it?
Yeah, it really made me think of them and old times.	It's always good to remember where you came from.
I recently had a shop fix my car. They worked so fast!	I'm sorry to hear that. That's not how car repair should work.
I was able to go home, but I realize now that I didn't even have to	That is awesome. I hope you get the car back soon.
My husband is going through the process of quitting smoking on top of dealing with drama from his parents. He is having a hard time.	I'm sorry he is having a tough time.

They aren't being supportive at all, but that's not surprising, that don't support him very well in anything. I just wish I could make it better for him, but I can't	That sucks.  I'm sorry that he's going through all that.  I hope it gets better.  Maybe they can learn from this.  Maybe it will help him in the future.
I have some great friends. One of them drove me to the airport tomorrow	Oh no! What happened?
Yes I am, they are great	Yeah, it is nice to have good friends
We just found out the person working in our accounting department has been stealing money from our company for years.	That is terrible.  What did they do exactly?

Yes, it just makes me sick to my stomach. You think you know someone but the whole time they are stealing you blind. I don't get some people	That's awful! I am so glad that it was discovered! I hope that the company is able to take action.
I miss high school. My girlfriend was the best	That sucks, what was her name?
That's great. College was also fun	I'm sure. What did you do during that time?
I recently bid farewell to a good friend. I miss her	I am sorry.  How long did you and your friend know each other?
Thank you, that means a lot. I will see her again	Oh, that is so sad. I hope you can make some new friends to keep you company.
I lost my car keys. I'm such a fool!	I've been in this situation before, but it's always a shock.  Did you try calling anyone to borrow them?
That's pretty funny, and makes me feel better. This is the first time I've lost my keys so I hope to keep it that way!	That is a funny story.

I came home the other day and my roommate had a friend over. I've only seen him with a friend over once in my 3.5 years of living here.	It is always good to see a friend over. I hope your roommate is friendly and you have nice conversations.

Yeah I sure was, he seems to like this one much better than the last one he had over. He couldn't wait for that first guy to leave.	That is good to hear. It's always nice to meet new people, and to be able to socialize.

One of my co-worker came and asked me a lot of really weird questions about my supervisor. It seemed suspicious so I pretty much told her I didn't know any of the answers to her questions. I don't think she likes my supervisor.	Yeah that happens. I've heard of people lying to get a promotion, or to be in a certain group.

Yeah I figured it was, so I just played dumb and let my supervisor know. My supervisor has always been good to me.	That makes a lot of sense. It seems like you're not being too friendly with your supervisor.
Man there aren't many people I would give my last couple hundred dollars to, with one notable exception.	That's an understatement, I don't know what to say. What did you do?
My buddy Stefan. He used it to print hundreds of bootleg concert posters. We sold them and netted $2000 a piece!	That's really cool. Did you ever see him perform live?
I finished first in a race. I feel like gold	That is amazing! Congratulations!
Yes! It was my first victory. All my hard work is paying off	That's awesome! Congratulations!
Some of my friends told me that they had a big surprise for me. They know I hate surprises, but I complied and let the blindfold me and drive me out to the location.	That's really sweet of them.
They had decided to pool their money together and get me one big present together. It was a flying lesson at the local airport.	That is awesome. Did you have fun?
I found an old photo album at my grandma's house that had pictures of me when I was a kid	I love looking at old family photo albums.
Yeah, it did. I really miss the 90s. Everything seemed a lot simpler in those days	Yeah, I'm pretty sure they have lots of them.

When I was in middle school, I had a friend come over to ride horses with me. After riding my mother pressured me to get on a horse bareback I wasn't comfortable riding. She made such a big scene that I got on to make her stop.	I bet you felt pretty uncomfortable!

Yes, the horse took off running and I got thrown into a metal fence. My mother then proceeded to yell and me and make fun of me for trusting her. She told me that I should never trust anyone not even my own parents, it was really embarrassing to get yelled at in from my friend. Afterwards my ribs hurt for 2 months.	I am glad you were okay.

My friend really wanted me to go rollerblading with him, but I haven't been rollerblading since I was a little kid. I didn't want to roll into a car.	I bet you did.  What did you do instead?  I used to rollblading.  It is a great way to get exercise!
We went, but it was still pretty terrible because I felt completely uncomfortable and was bent over the whole time ready to catch myself.	It was a good experience though.
My husband is on the road a lot, I hardley ever see him.	I bet you feel lonely sometimes?

Yes, its hard but I try to remember he does it for our family! I have been trying to adapt to enjoying alone time.	I am sure you can enjoy alone time and not have to think about your family. It's nice to have time for your self.
I have an interview for a job that I don't feel qualified for	That can be scary, do you think you'll get the job?
I will try. I'm a pretty anxious person in general so it's hard	Oh, I hope you do well. I'm sure you will.
I'm moving in a few months to a new state, I'm starting to feel nervous.	Oh no. What are you moving to?
To my husband hometown so it'll be new for me but he is excited to be back near family.	It can't be that hard to get used to.
I saw a dog get hit by car today on the highway.	I am so mad!  What did you do?
It was pretty tramatic, I still see the dog getting hit in my head and the sound. No, I was on my way to work, I couldn't stop :(	That is awful! Did you see the dog?
I can't even begin to tell you how nervous I was about my first tattoo.	Oh wow, I'm so nervous about my first time getting a tattoo.

Definitely! I get lightheaded when I see my own blood, and my pain threshold was low at the time. It turned out great though, and now I have several!	Oh, I can imagine. That's a scary feeling. But it's good that it turned out good in the end!
I love my husband! He has been so sweet this week!	That's nice. What is he like?

He knew I had a rough day today so he brought home my favourite wine and Taco Bell! It's the little things :)	That sounds like the perfect day!  I'm sure he knew you needed it.  What did you do today anyway?
It's been a great week!	Oh that's so great! How has your week been?
I got a promotion at work that I wasn't expecting!	Oh, that's good news! Congratulations!
Music is a powerful thing. Sometimes it feels like it can transport you to another time and place. You know what I mean?	That is so true, I have always loved music.

Who can deny it? My dad passed away 2 years ago. Sometimes I put on his old records and imagine what it would have been like to hang out with him in the 70s.	That's awesome. It's nice to have memories of loved ones that are no longer here. I'm so sorry about your dad.

I was feeling kind of down so I ended up snuggling with a stuffed rabbit I have. It brought back a lot of good old memories.	I know right? I used to love that stuffed rabbit. I have a few that my grandma gave me.

Awe yeah thanks. He's pretty soft even though he some derpy eye that point in opposite directions. Brings me a lot of comfort and reminds me that someone cares.	That's a great story. I have a stuffed bear too. It's my baby.
My dog got hit by a car.	It sounds awful. I hope he's okay.
He did not live. I've never felt so sad before.	That's awful. I'm so sorry to hear that.
Some random guy was in my backyard, I didn't realize before I looked outside that I was missing pants.	That's weird. What were you going to do?
Turns out he was the cable guy fixing a wire. Still mad he didn't ask permisson first.	I can't blame him, he was doing his job and I was a bit grumpy.

My family is still hasn't recovered from the untimely passing of my father two years ago.	That is terrible.  I am so sorry.  My family has lost a few family members recently and I know how that feels.  I am sure you are feeling a little down right about now.
My siblings and I are managing, and have found some peace. My mother is a different story. It was just so sudden and unexpected.	That is so sad. What did your dad do to make you all so close?
I've got a week off from work. Time to sleep in and binge watch my favorite shows.	That sounds like fun. What shows?
I like It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia. I'm rewatching it for the third time	It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia is a funny show.
I was really stressed out and grad school and had no choice but to drop out to keep my sanity.	i know, i was so upset. i thought i was going to fail.

That is what I was thinking at the time, but I've been having a really tough time finding a job where I can advance into a higher position. I always seem to get positions with no mobility.	I'm sorry, I understand that you're having a tough time. But it's hard not to be worried about the future when it's so hard to make ends meet in today's economy.

I tripped on some steps in front of a whole bunch of people on my way to class.	I can imagine how embarrassing that was. I've tripped so many times in my life. I'm sure it was embarrassing for everyone watching you.
It was pretty humiliating. I fell flat on my face.	Oh no, I'm sorry you had to deal with that. I'm sure it didn't help.
My boyfriend is sick. He can't eat much so I made some soup for him	I'm sorry to hear that! Hopefully it doesn't last long.
I made chicken noodle soup.	I bet that was very helpful!  Is he feeling better now?
I had a meeting last week where I gave a presentation over the wrong documentation and no one said anything until after the meeting.	That's so frustrating, I can't believe they didn't say anything
After I figured out what I did, I sure was. Ate at my cube ever since I don't even want to make eye contact with anyone.	That's not good. Did they tell you why?
I have a really big meeting next week. I have rehearsed what I am to go over all this past week and plan to practice a little more this weekend.	That is good, you will do well!
It's a meeting presenting a new product to the board. Big stuff and big money for the company.	That sounds exciting. What kind product are you presenting?
I caught my boyfriend texting his ex	Oh wow, did you confront them about it?
It was definitely a bit flirty. I think he misses being with her	I would be upset with him for that.  I don't know how you can handle that.
I know I broke up with my ex, but I can't help but feel irritated when he talks about going on dates.	I know that feeling.  He can be really annoying.

We actually get along really well and are much better friends than a couple. I guess I still just get a littler territorial, i think he does too.	I know you feel that way too but you should try to get over it. It's not going to make you happy
I can't wait to see my final grades. I think I got all A's this semester.	I hope you got all A's too!
On Monday. I'm going to treat myself if I did well	I am sure you will do great. You have put in a lot of effort.
I was very upset when I found my kitten today.	I'm sorry, what happened to the kitten?
No, I had to put it down. It ate a poisonous plant. He should not have been outside.	I'm sorry to hear that.  Did you take him to a vet?
I cried a bit, but kept it together for my little girl because she had let him out.	I enjoy visiting the nursing home on occasion.	It is a wonderful place. I visit my grandmother's home every month.

Not really, I take my daughter to see them, so many of them have no visitors at all.	Oh that sucks.  I don't really visit the nursing home either.  I'm afraid they have a lot of people who don't want visitors.
She likes to bake, so we take them what she makes :)	That's so sweet, what type of bakery do they make?
She is pretty good for an eleven year old, better than I was.	That's awesome. I've never baked anything myself, but I'm sure you're a great mom.

I had a secret and went to my mother to confide in her, as well as get off my chest. I know she would never betray my secret and can always count on her.	I know, I feel so much better now.  She is so caring and supportive.

Yes, I sure do! There aren't many people you can feel that way with and I am so grateful!	I can relate, my sister has been keeping some stuff on the down low for years, and I've been keeping some stuff on mine too. But my sister's been keeping it on her for years and I've been keeping it on mine. It's hard to deal with, but I'm glad to have a sister.
My son applied to a prestigious college and the wait killed us. I was anxious and nervous waiting to see if he was accepted!	Oh, that's exciting. What was the wait like?
He did! He's in his 3rd year, going to be an Aerospace Engineer, so we are very proud of him.	It is great. I have one son who is 4. He's in his 3rd year of college.

My sister passed away several years ago. She took her life, and my mother and I found her right after she did it. This was very painful, traumatic and hard for us all.	Oh, I'm so sorry. I'm so sorry for your loss.

It didn't really seem to sink in for my mother for awhile, she was in denial. But, it was so hard when it did. I went into a depression for awhile, as she was my only sibling and we were very close.	I'm sorry to hear that. Did you ever get to say anything about your feelings to her?
When my son first started college, I felt so much love and affection, but it was definitely hard to see him go! I was very proud though.	That's so cool! How old is he now?

He went to the University of Alabama in Huntsville. It's focused on science, engineering, etc. He's going to be an Aerospace Engineer. It's great to see him go for his dreams!	That's great, I bet it's a lot of hard work. I hope he does well and gets where he wants.
We went on vacation a few weeks ago and went to the beach, It was so relaxing and great. I really enjoyed the time with my family.	That's so nice. What did you do on vacation?

That's great! I'm sure you earned it, just like we do. It's so good to get some time away from the hustle and bustle of life!	It is so important to take time for ourselves and enjoy the simple things in life.

I am looking forward to next week! My husband has been out of town on business for several weeks and comes home next weekend!	That sounds like a nice time to have your husband back! I hope you have a wonderful time together!
I am going to cook a special meal and see if he wants to go out, just us two. I know he will like that.	That is so exciting!  I am sure you will have a great time! What is it?

My husband has been out of town a few weeks for work but is coming back next weekend. I have a surprise night planned for just us. I am optimistic and sure he will really enjoy it.	I'm sure you'll have a great time.
Thanks! We've been married almost 23 years but I try to keep things fun and spend time together.	It sounds like you two are really committed to each other.
My son went back to college recently and it had me feeling a bit nostalgic. I could just picture him starting Kindergarten and it seemed not so long ago!	That's so cool, how old is your son?

Yes, very. But, time sure has flown by with him growing up. I can just see his little blonde head when he was 5 and just starting school!	That's so true! I remember when my daughter was young and we would go to the park every day to play and she would get so sick and tired and then we would go to bed with her and she would sleep for a week. It was like she was just going to sleep and then suddenly wake up and be all "oh no, I'm so sick again!"
I was promoted to a Team Leader and I felt very secure I could do well at the job. I had years of experience and was ready for a leadership role.	I hope you do well! I hope you get a promotion too.
Yes, thank you! I had worked very hard through the years, and I felt that I earned it, and would do well at it.	It's great that you feel confident in yourself!

There was an incident where one of my back neighbors called my young son a name and made fun of him. I was so mad, beyond angry!	I hate when people do that to kids.  That is not right.  What did you do?

Yes, and she had two children of her own, similar in age. Her son also weighed more than mine! She did it because my son rode his bike through the corner of her yard as rode around the circle, that made her mad! Can you believe that??	Yeah, and I was not able to tell him that she was making a joke.
Last week my granddaughter started school for the first time. I worried about her the entire day.	It's normal to feel that way, especially if you have a history of anxiety.
It turns out she loves and and I was a mess for 8 hours for nothing.	I'm glad she did well! What did she start at?

I always try and plan everything in advance to bring everything we need when we go on vacation. We recently went on our honeymoon and I didn't do very well this time. Ugh!	That is terrible.  Did you plan anything?  I always try to be prepared for anything.

I forgot everything. I guess I was so excited about the wedding, I totally failed at packing this time. Oh well, it was still fun.	It was fun! I'm so sorry you had such a hard time! I would be so upset if I had to forget everything!

One day I was visiting a friend and her boyfriend came up and kissed me, while I was waiting for my friend to return from another room! It was sneaky and repulsed me!	Oh wow, I would have felt the same way.

I didn't....only because of her situation. She had custody of her very ill and handicapped infant grandson, she wasn't working so depended on him financially and she was very much in love with him. She already suspected he was with other women, and stayed.....	I'm sorry to hear that, but at least he is a good guy.
The other night I was home alone and all of a sudden I heard someone knocking at the door really loud and they wouldn't stop. I was so scared.	That would be so frightening.

No, I ignored them and they finally went away. I was just about to call the police before they left though. I hope that doesn't happen again.	I would have been a little worried, but I'm not a scared person. I'm sure they just didn't know what they were doing and just didn't mean anything by it.

I was trying to ignore the fact that my 50th birthday was coming up but my family decided to throw me a surprise party.	I love surprises.  I'm not a fan of birthdays.  How did you like the surprise party?
It was so much fun and such a happy night. I'm trying to embrace my age now and not ignore it any more	It's a good thing that you were not expecting it.

A few weeks ago, my husband and I had a big argument. I said some pretty hurtful things, and wished I hadn't. I felt very bad and disappointed in myself afterwards.	That can be tough. Did you apologize?

Yes, that's true. I tend to be a bit more verbal on my end and say things I regret later.	Yeah, I can understand that. It is always good to take a step back and think about how things might sound to others. I hope it doesn't come to that and you both just can't agree.

One night when my kids and I came home, I saw a shadow in my hallway as I came in the back door. I was so scared and was afraid someone had broken in my home.	It would have been so terrifying. Did you ever find anything out?

Yes, and I live out in the country so I wouldn't get a quick response time from emergency vehicles. But, luckily, it turned out to be my shadow!	I'm glad that it turned out to be just your shadow. I would have been so scared!

There was a day that I was a bit short on cash on hand and I didn't give money to a homeless man. I usually always do, as I feel it's my part to help those in need, as I am blessed. I felt very bad that I didn't that day.	It's always good to be considerate of the people that are less fortunate than us.

Well, homeless people aren't common in my area, so that's why I felt a bit bad about it.	I agree, homelessness isn't common where I live either, so I feel it's my part to give.  I feel it's my part to help those in need, as I am blessed.
When my children were born, it was a rejoicing time for me. I can't think of a time I felt more happiness.	That's great! How many kids do you have?
Yes, I have two children and I feel so blessed to have them. I lucked out and got a boy and girl, both healthy, smart and wonderful.	That's so wonderful.  Do you have any kids?

I used to work in a place where all my colleagues had different believes to myself. I wanted to stay true to what I believed in, so had to walk away from conversations on many occasions.	I can relate to this situation. I had to walk away from a group conversation because one of the people in the group disagreed with what I believed. I didn't want to conflict with them.

Just that all people should be given an equal chance in life and that no one type of person is better than another, just because of their religion or skin color, or where they come from.	I agree, I think we should all be treated equally, regardless of how they came to be here. I'm a Muslim, and I have a friend who's a Muslim, but we both work together in the same office and are friends.

They believed that people of their religion where better than everyone else and were going to heaven, while the rest of us are left at the gate! That's one of their beliefs anyway. I don't agree with that, but chose to keep my mouth shut!	I recently bought a new car after not driving for several years and I was really scared to drive it, especially on the highway.	That's so exciting! Did you drive it safely?
Just a Honda Civic. People drive crazy around here. I don't want to have another car accident like the last one.	That's terrible. Are you driving it in the rain?

I recently joined a group to help me lose weight. I have so much respect and admire everyone in that group so much.	That's great! I've joined a few groups myself, but I've never joined one that's specifically for weight loss. What kind of group is this?

It has really helped to have their support. I am so grateful for them	That is awesome!  I hope it works for you.  I have been trying to lose weight for a long time, but I have been having trouble sticking to my diet and exercise plans.  Maybe I should try to join a group too.  I am sure it would make a big difference.
A few years ago I applied for US citizenship. To succeed you have to pass a Civics test. I was so terribly nervous!	I have always been nervous about it. I'm not a good test-taker.
I passed! Turns out you only had to answer three questions correctly. But they have 50 to choose from so you have to study the lot!	Oh wow, that is a lot! But I bet you were proud of yourself!

Thank you. My poor husband had to sit every single night and test me. He's American and he didn't think he could pass!	I found some old Christmas cards the other day and had a lovely time reading them and reminiscing about the people who sent them.	That's a nice way to look at it. I'm sure it brought some good memories for you.

It was so nice. I'm terrible about throwing cards out. I feel, if someone's taken the time to write, I should preserve it. Does that sound silly?	I think that's a very good point, but I guess I've thrown some out because I thought it was too much effort to keep them.

That's very true. My Dad kept everything too. When he passed we had quite a task sorting through things. I think my brother's still at it!	That's very nice of you.  I have a lot of old cards and papers that I keep.  I'm not sure what to do with them all of the time.
I believe you are right! My family are going to go nuts when they see what they've got to deal with, lol.	I'm sorry I don't have the time to read a lot of books. I just have a lot of work and family.
When I was entering the store it was really slippery.	Oh wow, that's a pretty scary thing to happen. Did you trip?
It had been raining , so I ran across the parking lot in to the store. I slid about 3 feet.	Oh wow, that's crazy! Did anyone see you?
I was fine, just felt like every one was looking at me.	I am feeling a bit guilty about keeping a secret for my friend.	I know how that feels.
I don't want to out her to her husband, usually the only thing that happens is they drop the friend.	That's a pretty tough decision to make.  Do you feel like you're doing the right thing?
Thanks, I am just going to avoid them until it plays iteself out.	I feel kind of blue today, they announced the parts for the annual play.	That's a bummer! What's the play about?
I did, and it is a good one, just not the one that I wanted. I didn't want the lead or anything.	Oh, that's a bummer!
It is, my friend got it, or I wouldn't think about it so much. Thanks for the kind words though.	I'm teaching my daughter how to drive, and so far, so good!	Oh, good!  How is it going?

She is!  At first, though, she was very nervous.  I told her we could start off slow - her dad lives 1 mile from me down a quiet road, so we started driving back and forth between the two houses.	That's great!  I hope she enjoys driving.

Hopefully by the first of the year.  We've worked up to driving to the dollar store 5 miles away.  She's still a little nervous but she's getting better and more confident the more we practice.	That is so awesome. You are so lucky!

I do what I can where I can.  Can't wait for our hard work to pay off and she gets her license!	I'm glad to hear that you guys are working towards this.  It's great that you're both supporting each other and working together to get her to drive further and further away from home.  I'm happy to hear that you're working hard to get this done.  I bet you'll both be proud of each other when it's all done!
My house is a mess and I've got people coming over later on this evening.	That is a bit stressful.
I'm going to try to.  If worst comes to worse, I'll just toss everything in my back bedroom, shiny up the floors and hope for the best!  *chuckle*	I bet you're excited to see what they bring!

My brother and I recently had to sell a house and he dealt with everything. I'm so lucky to have a brother I can rely on and who I know won't try and con me.	That's very cool.  My brother and I also sold a house, but it was a lot more complicated.  I'm glad you have someone to lean on.

We did and he was so precise with who got what and made sure he sent me my share quickly. He's such a neat brother in so many regards. I always know he'll be there for anyone who needs help.	Yeah, I've got a brother too. I'm lucky to have him.

We weren't always close. When we were kids we were always fighting. It wasn't until we got older that we got closer. We're best of friends now.	Yeah I've been there.  My older brother is like my best friend.  We've been through a lot.  He's always looking out for the younger brother.  We were always fighting.

Don't be! There are many, many types of relationships and I don't think ours is necessarily typical. It's just the way it is :)	That is a great relationship. I am glad to hear it is not typical of everyone.

My son was in advance placement and honors during high school. He went to a prestigious college after, going for as an Aerospace Engineer. He never ceases to astonish me with his intelligence and admire me with how hard he works to pursue his dreams.	that's awesome! i'm so proud of you!

I am quite proud, thank you! I also have a teenage daughter that is very smart and an amazing artist, (which I don't know where she gets that talent). They really impress me with amazing they are!	I am so proud of you and your children. You have a lot to be proud of.
Going out today to learn a new route for my job and I'm hoping that I don't get lost.	Yeah, you can get lost. But I'm sure it's just a little bit.

I got the assignment yesterday, and I told myself that I'd go drive around it today and tomorrow.  My boss is supposed to ride along with me the first week, and then after that I'll be on my own.	Yeah, that's a good idea! You can always ask for a map or a GPS.
I was over here in the US when my Grandma passed in Scotland. I was so upset - nobody could get hold of me to tell me and her funeral was over before I knew about it.	I am sorry.  What happened?
Only for funerals, unfortunately. Both my parents have since died. Unpleasant fact of life, I'm afraid.	I'm sorry to hear.  I hope you're okay.  I know it's tough losing loved ones.

Yes I was. I didn't come to the US until I was in my 30s. Didn't expect my Grandma to pass the minute I got here, but she was 96, so it shouldn't have been such a surprise!	I am sorry to hear that.  I hope they have a good funeral and are in heaven.
She was as fit as a flea too. She tripped and broke her hip and got a bad infection in the hospital. That's what she died of!	That's awful. I hope you're doing alright.
I just bought an Xbox! I've never owned a gaming console before	I have never owned an Xbox either, but I have played a few times.
I am! I bought Halo and am ready to ride.	That is awesome. I am excited for that.

My father passed away 2 years ago, but my mother lives in my neighborhood now. I'm so thankful she lives close by and still here with us. She's such a wonderful mother.	That is so kind of her.  I hope she continues to take care of herself and stay in your life.

I'm sorry to hear that, I know it's so hard to lose a parent. I think we take them for granted when we are younger, but I am blessed she's still here.	That's a great point, my mom is always there for me and my family, and I appreciate that.
I am as happy as a clam right now. My neighbors are away for the weekend!	Oh wow. What's the weekend for them?

The live upstairs and constantly thump around, screeching into their cellphones. And then there's the video games...	Oh, wow! I can only imagine how you feel about it!  Are you going to go hang out with them?  Or are you going to stay home?

Oh I am, believe me I am. The world seems like a calm, serene place where everything is just right!	My friend from across the continent came over yesterday! I was so happy about it	That is awesome! What country?
We ended up hanging out and recording some audio. He is a voice actor	That's awesome.  I love voice acting.  I've been doing it for years.  What kind of character do he do?
I was out for a walk one night in a suburb of Boston when we heard the cries of a young animal. It was a baby kitten, with no collar, in a window well.	Oh that is so sad.  What did you do?
We actually did, and ended up adopting him. He was still so young he needed formula, but now he is thriving!	Oh that is great, how old is he now?
I felt a need to help when the baby bird was by itself	I'm glad you felt the need to help!
I did not, I was little but I think I put it back into a tree	That's so kind of you. I would do that too.
Waiting to see if I would graduate was pretty unnerving	That is bad. Are you going to college?
Yep, had to take a class online over the summer but it worked out	I'm glad that worked out for you.
I forgot my mother-in-law's birthday this year and can't look her in the eye!	That is horrible. Did you call her?
I just feel so embarrassed - she never forgets my birthday. And my husband was away and didn't remind me :(	That must have been really tough for you.

You're right. She's a very forgiving person and I've never forgotten before. It's on St. Paddy's day for heavens sake - how could I forget???	I was the only one wearing pajamas at this party, not my greatest moment	That's the worst. I hate wearing pajamas at parties.
I thought that it was a pajama party haha, never worn a dress before, maybe that's the secret	I can understand that, I wear pajamas at work too.
I had some trippy nightmares as a kid, now I don't really have dreams	I bet you must have been very scared
Yeah, it was like I was tied to a chair and a huge thing was staring at me, pretty weird	It's always weird to hear about the past of dreams.
I didn't realize that stealing was bad until I realized how it made me feel afterwards	I feel bad when I do something wrong.
No, I was scared to get charged, but I stopped after that	Yeah, I've done it before too. It really makes you realize that it wasn't right.
I was at a meditation retreat last year for 10 days and I can say that I experienced a better feeling there than I could ever remembe	I love meditation, I do it every week. It's so calming.
Yeah, thankfully there's an app for that - Headspace (no I am not sponsored)	I have never been to a meditation retreat before.  What is it?
I am really looking forward to going away for the holidays.	That's great! What's your family like?
I want to go see the Harry Potter land at Universal, the kids will love it.	Oh that is fun. I am sure the kids will enjoy it.
They love the films, plus getting to ride Hogwarts Express, score!	I'm really hoping my acceptance letter shows up in the mail soon.	That's awesome, did you get a letter from a college or university?
Law School, I'm pretty sure I got in to my first choice, but you never know.	That is great news! You will make a great lawyer!

Thank you, fingers are crossed.	I just ordered a new cookery book and am eagerly awaiting its arrival. I want to delve in and try lots of new recipes!	That's so exciting! I've been waiting a long time for my cookbook to arrive! I hope it's not too long.

I'm vegetarian and cook all sorts of different cuisines - Indian, Italian, American. The only cuisine I'm not good at is Chinese. How about you?	You're right, I've always been a bit of an adventurous eater. I've never really been to China, but I've heard great things about the food. I'll have to try some of the recipes.

Have you heard of Mark Bittman's book How to Cook Everything Vegetarian? That's the book I'm waiting impatiently for!	I witnessed the most epic bottle flip in the history of bottle flips at my school	I'm a little jealous that I never get to see those things. What happened?
Yee yee, it landed on this little ledge that was super high up.	That is pretty cool, what did you do next?
My little grandson just came home from the hospital. He was born premature and weighted under 2 pounds.	I'm so glad to hear he's healthy and doing well! How long has he been home?
He is doing well, thank you. And we are so thankful everything is ok. It was touch and go for awhile	That's great! I'm sure he's going to do well.
I love my girlfriend. She would never cheat on me	That's awesome, I hope you're together for life!
I hope to make her my wife some day!	I am happy for you.
My sister spilled some milk on me. It set me off!	That's terrible!  Did you get mad?
It was indeed a mistake. My clothes are fine now.	That's terrible! I'm sorry that you had to deal with that!
I recently did not pay my rent. My land lord has been terrible at providing services	I am sorry to hear that.  Are you going to call a collection agency?
He decided to start caring and doing his part.	I would have done the same thing. I would have been angry at him for being so bad. I would not have done it to my brother or sister.
I'm thankful that I was able to repair my tire before it went flat on my car	I'm glad that it was not your car.

Right, I caught it just as it happened and brought it to the shop, didn't cost as much as I thought it would either.	Oh that is so nice of you.  I am sure it was frustrating.  I hope you were able to get the tire fixed and that you are okay.
I love my friend. She just drove me to class	That's so sweet of her.
I think I am getting her a gift soon!	I love my friends as well, I am glad you have a good relationship with them.
I stole from my friends when I was a child. I feel terrible about it now	Oh, I'm sure it's a minor mistake.
It was some Pokemon cards!	That's not good.  I'm sorry you feel that way.  I'm sorry I made a similar mistake.  I was a little kid.
My father almost passed away last year. It was very tough on everyone	I'm sorry.  I hope he is okay now.
Yes, he has made a full recovery! It's been a journey	That is great news.  How old was he when he passed away?
I remember when I was a young one. I loved life.	I know. I have fond memories of that time too
I do, but maybe not with he same flare as before	I'm sure that's true. Life is good, but it's always nice to look back on it.
I helped find my friend's cats. She's glad they're back now	That's nice! Did you have a problem finding them?
Yes they both just wandered off when the door was open!	What cats?
5	I love how much people love to share their life on social media. It's like you can't turn on the lights without seeing someone posting about their vacation or their adorable cat.
I recently got an A on my paper. I feel great.	That is awesome! Congratulations! How did you do?
I went swimming recently. I lost my trunks walking out of the pool.	Oh no, that is bad. What did you do?
Yeah, we all have a good laugh about it now	I bet. Did you guys get your trunks back?
Drinking a gallon of milk in a day wasn't a good idea	I was drinking 4 gallons a day.  I had a stomachache for weeks.
I wanted to see how hard it would be, turns out my stomach was JUST big enough	I would have done the same!
My friend slept with a girl I like. I feel horrible now	I would feel the same way
No, but I don't think he is my friend any more	I understand. I would probably tell him I didn't know and see if he would do it for me instead.
I don't like working with managers that try to micro-manage me	I understand, I have been in management for a long time and I know how to let people do things.
Right, it kind of feels like they're insecure with their abilities while trying to make me feel bad at the same time	I understand where you're coming from, I feel the same way.
Teeth are weird, but also take a lot of upkeep which is sometimes irritating	It's like my dentist says, they're a lot of work.
Yeah that's what my dentist says, I'll try	Yeah, it's hard to take.  But you have to do it.  I've had a lot of dental work done, and it is hard.  But you need to have clean teeth.
I wake up with chills sometimes for no reason	I am sure it has to be something.
I think it's from dreams that I'm not able to recall	i have that too. i think it's the brain.

I wasn't able to reach my goals in the gym a couple days ago, and it helped me realize where I'm slacking off in other areas	That is true. Sometimes you need to be in other places to see where you need to work on.

Yeah, it's fun to see how much you can conquer yourself, and it's nice to be able to see how you're changing	Yeah, it's fun to see how much you can conquer yourself, and it's nice to be able to see how you're changing
I recently went skydiving. It was a thrilling rush	Oh wow, that's a very adventurous thing you did. I have never gone skydiving. How was your experience?
It was excellent. I feel so alive!	Yeah that was pretty cool. I'm not really adventurous but I love the rush of adrenaline when I'm skydiving. I hope I'll get the chance to go again!

I think I will have success in my life. I love life these days!	I love your optimism! I feel like it is very hard to be positive in the world right now, but it is good to have someone to share your optimism.
I recently finished a new album I have been working on!	That's awesome! Congratulations! What kind of music do you make?
I'm excited to think of all the possibilities that are available to me at the moment	That is awesome, what do you want to do?
Being able to learn basically anything with the internet for one	That's the best part of the world.  It's always good to have the world at your fingertips.
I like meditating because it puts things into perspective in a way that I don't usually expect	I'm not really good at meditation.
For sure, my mind is pretty energetic	I meditate every day. I think meditation is very good for your mind and it helps you to be more productive.

I've been processing what being lonely feels like, because I want to be able to have fun by myself sometimes	That is good. It is a normal thing for many people, especially when they have a job to support their family. I am sure it doesn't bother you much.

True, and I've felt that way before, but sometimes like a wave of those kinds of feelings hits like I'm not worthy enough and stuff like that, but it's all good	That sounds like a really tough feeling to deal with.  What are you doing to try and get out of it?
I'm trying to get over my need to control things, and I find if I just let things happen it feels like a weights been pulled off my shoulders	Oh, that's good, it's good to not be so controlling.

Right, but things always seem to turn out for the best anyway	That makes sense. Sometimes you have to let go of control and trust that everything will work out in the best possible way. It's hard sometimes but it's necessary
I grew up pretty skinny and now that I've grown some muscle I feel a lot more comfortable in my skin	That's great! I wish you the best!
around 9 months, been pretty slow to make progress but overall it's been solid	That's awesome! You're a rockstar!
I am going to go camping tomorrow! The back's already packed	It's going to be fun! I love camping.
I hope not. I'm in Florida so it might get bad	I hope so too! I love camping, especially in Florida! I'm not sure if it will get bad though. I don't like getting sick when I'm sick.
My old house burned down, and I went to check it out, was surreal taking a look around the place	I am sorry to hear that. What was it?
Yeah, it was built a long time ago, some kind of electrical fire	I am sorry to hear about that, did you lose anything?
I was truly surprised when I notice my tire got hit by a rock, thought I wouldn't make it to the tire place in time	I'm sorry to hear that.  Did you get to the tire place?
